translation: n.婴儿；宝贝儿；孩子气的人adj.婴儿的；小型的vt.溺爱
examples: (1) She gave birth to a fine healthy baby.(2) The mother rocked the baby to sleep in its cradle.(3) We've turned the smallest bedroom into a nursery for our new baby.(4) Baby, come on, let's go home, I'm tired.(5) Don't be such a baby.(6) Since 2001, organic baby food sales have jumped 63%.(7) Don't baby the boy.
(1) 她生了一个健康漂亮的婴儿。(2) 母亲摇动摇篮使婴儿入睡。(3) 我们已将最小的那间卧室改成新生婴儿的幼儿室。(4) 宝贝儿，快点儿，我们回家吧，我累了。(5) 别那么孩子气。(6) 从2001年以来,有机婴儿食品销售额已上升63%25。(7) 别惯这孩子。

translation: n.单身汉；学士
examples: (1) You have the alternative of marrying or remaining a bachelor.(2) He remained a bachelor all his life.(3) Are you a Bachelor of Arts?(4) Bush graduated from Yale with a bachelor's degree in history in 1968,
(1) 你可以结婚也可以仍做单身汉，任你选择。(2) 他终生未娶。(3) 你是文学学士吗？(4) 布什1968年从耶鲁大学毕业，获历史学学士学位，

translation: n.背痛；腰痛
examples: (1) Poor posture will give you backache.(2) The only way to cure backache is to rest.
(1) 坐姿不好会使人腰背酸痛。(2) 治疗背痛的唯一办法是休息。

translation: n.背景；经历；幕后；后景vt.提供背景
examples: (1) He has a strong political background.(2) It is wrong to differentiate between people according to their family background.(3) With my working-class background I feel like a fish out of water among these high-society people.(4) Her marketing background made her a natural choice for the job.(5) He stayed in the background to escape from the public attention.(6) He took a picture of me with the pavilion in the background.
(1) 他有强大的政治背景。(2) 根据出身不同而区别待人是不对的。(3) 我出身于工人阶级,在上流社会中感到很不自在。(4) 她的经销经历使她成为这一职位的必然人选。(5) 他呆在幕后为了避开公众的注意。(6) 他以那个亭子为背景给我照了一张相片。

translation: adj.向后的；落后的adv.向后
examples: (1) He took a backward step and ran away.(2) This part of the country is still backward.(3) Although he is clever, he is backward in giving his views.(4) He looked backward over his shoulder.(5) He stepped backward and fell over the cliff.
(1) 他向后退了一步,跑了。(2) 这个国家的这个地区仍很落后。(3) 他虽然很聪明，却不善发表他的意见。(4) 他回头向后看。(5) 他向后退了一步就从悬崖上掉下去了。

translation: n.培根；咸肉；熏肉
examples: (1) I'll plump for bacon and eggs rather than breakfast cereal.(2) The bacon is all frizzled up!(3) I'll rustle up some eggs and bacon for you.
(1) 我宁愿吃咸肉和鸡蛋，而不愿吃谷类制作的早餐食品。(2) 腌肉都煎糊了！(3) 我给你弄些鸡蛋和腌猪肉。

translation: n.细菌
examples: (1) Most of disease is caused from bacterium.(2) A bacterium was identified as the cause for his duodenal ulcer.
(1) 大多数疾病都是由细菌引起的。(2) 一种细菌被断定为造成他十二指肠溃疡的根源。

translation: n.羽毛球
examples: (1) I like to play badminton in my spare time.(2) He went to the badminton club at times during his school days.(3) He's in his element when playing badminton.(4) He plays tennis better than badminton.(5) I played badminton with my friends.(6) We go to play badminton in the nearest gym every Sunday.
(1) 我喜欢在闲暇时打羽毛球。(2) 他上学时有时到羽毛球俱乐部去。(3) 他打起羽毛球来真是得心应手。(4) 他网球比羽毛球打得好。(5) 我和朋友打了羽毛球。(6) 每个星期天我们都去最近的体育馆打羽毛球。

translation: n.行李
examples: (1) Let me put your baggage in the trunk.(2) Our baggage has cleared customs.
(1) 我来把你的行李放在汽车后部的行李箱内。(2) 我们的行李已通过海关检查。

translation: v.烤；烘焙；烘干；灼热
examples: (1) The bread is baking in the oven.(2) I will bake Tracy several buns now.(3) We bake bread and cake in an oven.(4) In some places, bricks are still baked in the sun.
(1) 烤箱里正在烤面包。(2) 我现在要为特蕾西烤几个小面包。(3) 我们用烤箱烘面包与糕点。(4) 有些地方仍使用在太阳下晒干砖块的方法。

translation: n.面包店；面包厂
examples: (1) The bakery serves us with fresh bread daily.(2) We were in luck, for the bakery was still open.
(1) 面包店每天都给我们提供新鲜面包。(2) 我们总算走运，面包店还开着。

translation: n.平衡；天平；平静；结余；差额；调和；制衡vt.权衡；使平衡；抵消；称重量vi.均衡；建立平衡
examples: (1) The girl lost her balance and fell off the balance beam.(2) Great care must be taken in the use of the balance.(3) He used a very sensitive torsion balance.(4) Sunday is a great time to balance out whatever area of your life has felt disordered as of late.(5) We need to maintain some semblance of balance and some sense that we are steering the ship of our life.(6) Kindly remit us the balance without delay .(7) In other words, the balance of trade may deteriorate rather than improve.(8) The balance of the shade and the sun on the tree-trunks and on the ground is beautiful beyond words.(9) EBN is balance in Yin and Yang, sweet and mild, making it a surprisingly pleasant medicinal food.(10) The balance of terror has replaced the balance of power.(11) Locke's ideas on the power balance are still inspiring in modem societies.(12) You have to balance the advantages of living in a big city against the disadvantages.(13) The company will lay off workers to balance the budget.(14) This year's profits will balance our previous losses.(15) The dancer could balance on one toe.(16) The aviator warped a wing tip to regain balance.

(1) 小女孩失去了平衡，从平衡木上摔了下来。(2) 这种天平使用时必须十分当心。(3) 他利用了一架非常灵敏的扭力天平。(4) 星期天是你最近动荡不安的生活得到平静的大好时机。(5) 我们需要保持平静的外表，和一种我们掌握了我们的生活之舟的意识。(6) 请立即把余额汇给我们。(7) 换句话说,国际贸易差额不但不会改善,反而可能会恶化。(8) 射在树干与地面上的阳光和树荫，其色彩之调和，真是美得难以形容。(9) 燕窝的特质是阴阳调和，带甜温和，使到其成为人们喜欢享用的保健品。(10) 恐惧的制衡已经取代了强权的制衡。(11) 洛克权力制衡思想对现代社会仍然具有启发意义。(12) 你必须权衡住在大城市的利与弊。(13) 这家公司会裁员,以平衡预算。(14) 本年度的盈利将与上一年度的亏损相抵。(15) 舞蹈演员可以用一个脚趾平衡。(16) 飞行员使一机翼的端部翘起,以恢复平衡。

translation: n.阳台；楼座；包厢
examples: (1) The prospect from the balcony was breathtaking.(2) He planted some flowers on the balcony that projects over the street.(3) He was watching a performance from the balcony.(4) I'm sorry, all the balcony seats are sold out.
(1) 从阳台上看去景色美极了。(2) 他在那个伸出到街上的阳台上种了些花。(3) 他正在从楼厅上看电影。(4) 抱歉,包厢的票都卖完了。

translation: n.芭蕾舞
examples: (1) He did a sketch of the ballet dancers.(2) She invited us to see the ballet.
(1) 他为这些芭蕾舞者画了一张素描。(2) 她邀请我们去看芭蕾舞。

translation: n.气球；球状物vt.使膨胀vi.乘气球飞行；激增；如气球般膨胀adj.气球状的
examples: (1) A balloon floated across the sky.(2) He balloons his cheeks when he is hesitant.(3) He tried to balloon around the earth but storms forced him to land in China.(4) Our expenses had ballooned.(5) Her skirt ballooned in the wind.
(1) 有个气球从空中飘过。(2) 他迟疑不决时会鼓起双颊。(3) 他试图乘气球做环球旅行，但风暴迫使他降落在中国。(4) 我们的开销大大增加了。(5) 她的裙子让风吹得鼓起来了。

translation: n.圆珠笔(=ballpoint pen)
examples: (1) Do you sell this kind of ballpoint?(2) You can buy the ballpoint pen anywhere.(3) The boys were bickering over some ballpoints.
(1) 你们卖这种圆珠笔吗？(2) 你到哪儿都能够买到这种圆珠笔。(3) 那些男孩子为几支圆珠笔争吵起来了。

translation: v.禁止；剥夺权利n.禁令；禁止
examples: (1) The government has banned the use of chemical weapons.(2) She was banned from athletics for two years after failing a drug test.(3) There is a ban on smoking in the theatre.
(1) 政府已经禁止使用化学武器。(2) 她在药检中被查出服用禁用药物而被禁赛两年。(3) 这剧院内禁止吸烟。

translation: n.绷带vt.用绷带包扎
examples: (1) The nurse eased away the bandage from the wound.(2) I twisted the bandage round her knee.(3) The waitress put a bandage round his hand.(4) The surgeon bandaged up his injured head.(5) Do you know how to bandage an injured arm?
(1) 护士小心翼翼地解开伤口处的绷带。(2) 我用带缠住了她的膝盖。(3) 女服务员用绷带将他的手包扎起来。(4) 外科医生把他受伤的头部包扎起来。(5) 你知道如何包扎受伤的胳膊吗?

translation: n.银行账户
examples: (1) He paid the money into his bank account.(2) I want to keep my Swiss bank account open.
(1) 他把钱存在他的银行账户上。(2) 我想保留我的瑞士银行账户。

translation: n.酒吧；条；横木；栅vt.禁止；阻挠；闩上；在 ... 设栅栏
examples: (1) There are several bars in the hotel.(2) A bar of chocolate is enough to stop his crying.(3) There's a strong bar on the door.(4) There is a burning man hovering in the air over a grille in the Smoldering Corpse Bar.(5) After the bombing, the whole area was barred to the public.(6) The members voted to bar women from the club.(7) I will bar no honest man to my house.
(1) 这家旅馆里有好几个酒吧。(2) 一条巧克力就可以让他不哭了。(3) 门上有一个很坚固的闩。(4) 有一个焚烧中的人，飘浮在冒烟尸体酒吧的铁栅上方。(5) 轰炸后，整个地区禁止公众通行。(6) 会员表决不让妇女加入该俱乐部。(7) 我不会阻止任何诚实的人到我家里来。

translation: n.烤肉；烧烤；烤架v.烤炙
examples: (1) The sunshine bodes well for our barbecue.(2) The rain loused up the barbecue.(3) If you're not busy Sunday, we'd love to have you both over for a barbecue.(4) We can't calculate on having good weather for the barbecue.(5) I put another steak on the barbecue.(6) Now and then we like to barbecue chicken in the back yard.
(1) 明媚的阳光对我们的烤肉野餐是个吉兆。(2) 下雨弄砸了烤肉野餐。(3) 如果你周日有空，我们想请你们俩来吃烧烤。(4) 我们不能指望着有好天气才去烧烤。(5) 我在烤架上又放了一块肉排。(6) 我们偶而会在后院子里烤鸡吃。

translation: n.理发师vi.当理发师vt.给…理发；修剪
examples: (1) The barber thinned out my thick hair.(2) His father apprenticed him to a barber.(3) The barber bought one of his brooms, and, when he had shaved him, asked for the price of it.(4) They sat in twos and threes on the trim barbered lawn.
(1) 理发师把我浓密的头发削薄了一些。(2) 他父亲送他去当理发师的徒弟。(3) 当理发师给他修完面后，问了一下扫帚的价钱。(4) 他们三三两两地坐在修剪平整的草坪上。

translation: n.理发店adj.四重唱的；无伴奏重唱的
examples: (1) She opened up a barbershop of her own.
(1) 她开了一个自己的理发店。

translation: adj.赤裸的；空的；仅有的；贫瘠的，荒芜的vt.使裸露；暴露
examples: (1) The fierce sun parched the bare earth.(2) The boy likes to walk on the sand with bare feet.(3) The little room was almost bare of furniture.(4) A bare word would be enough for me.(5) He bared his head.(6) The dog bared its teeth.(7) He bared his heart to the girl.
(1) 灼热的阳光炙烤着光秃秃的大地。(2) 这男孩喜欢赤脚在沙滩上走。(3) 这个小房间几乎没有什么家俱。(4) 对我来说一句话就够了。(5) 他脱掉了帽子。(6) 狗露出了牙齿。(7) 他向这个女孩吐露自己的真情。

translation: n.交易；便宜货；契约v.讨价还价；议价；(谈价钱后)卖
examples: (1) He made a satisfactory bargain with them.(2) If you promote our goods, we will give you a good discount as our part of the bargain.(3) She knows a bargain when she sees one.(4) There never was a better bargain driver.(5) They sealed their bargain by shaking hands.(6) The salesman refused to bargain over the price.(7) Bargain like a gypsy,but pay like a gentleman.(8) The leaders bargained away the freedom of their people.
(1) 他和他们做了一笔满意的交易。(2) 若你方经销我们的货物，我方愿给予你相当大的优惠作为回报。(3) 她有辨别便宜货的能力。(4) 再没有比这更美好的契约。(5) 他们握手表示确认交易契约。(6) 推销员拒绝讨价还价。(7) 议价时斤斤计较，付帐时爽快利落。(8) 领导人拿人民的自由来做交易。

translation: v.(狗)吠；咆哮v.剥皮；擦伤n.狗吠；咆哮n.树皮
examples: (1) The dog barked when the stranger came near.(2) An old dog does not bark for nothing.(3) When you speak to people, don't bark at them.(4) Some officers bark out their orders.(5) He barked his elbow on the wall.(6) Those trees have very beautiful white bark.(7) The bark of plane trees peels off regularly.(8) We found that birch bark could serve as paper.
(1) 当陌生人走近时，狗叫了起来。(2) 老狗不会无事而吠。(3) 当你和人说话时不要咆哮。(4) 有些军官以粗暴的声音发布命令。(5) 他碰到墙上，肘部擦破了皮。(6) 那些树长着非常漂亮的白色树皮。(7) 悬铃木的树皮到时候就脱落。(8) 我们发现桦树皮可以作纸用。

translation: n.栅栏；障碍物；屏障
examples: (1) The ice skater rammed into the barrier.(2) Heavy duties on imports and exports are a barrier to international trade.(3) The Sahara Desert is a natural barrier between north and central Africa.
(1) 溜冰者撞到护栏上了。(2) 进出口的高关税是国际贸易的障碍。(3) 撒哈拉沙漠是北非与中非之间的天然屏障。

translation: n.根基；地下室
examples: (1) Dam Monitoring Dam monitoring at a mountain water reservoir during the basement stablization.(2) The dampness in the basement damaged his books.
(1) 大坝监测水库大坝监测在根基稳定期间。(2) 地下室的潮湿将他的书损坏了。

translation: adj.基本的；基础的；初级的；含硅少的n.基础；根本；[计]BASIC语言
examples: (1) The family is the basic unit of society.(2) The right to work is a basic right of the citizens.(3) Food, clothing and shelter are all basic necessities of life.(4) Basic research is of great importance in all scientific fields.(5) We should give priority to the development of the basic industries.(6) All the people can be accessible to basic health care services in the future.(7) His research formed the basic of his new book.(8) BASIC is the language most programmers learn first.
(1) 家庭是社会的基本单位。(2) 劳动权是公民的一项基本权利。(3) 衣、 食、 住所是生活的基本必需品。(4) 在各个科学领域里,基础研究是非常重要的。(5) 我们要优先发展基础工业。(6) 在将来能实现人人享有初级卫生保健服务。(7) 他的研究成果构成了这本新书的基础。(8) BASIC是大多数程序编制者首先学习的语言。

translation: n.脸盆；盆地；流域；水池
examples: (1) This basin is made of iron.(2) He washed his hands in a basin.(3) He first poured some water in the basin.(4) Wenshui lies in the west of Taiyuan Basin.(5) The whole river basin is covered with tropical forest.(6) If Iris is right, I just need to dip the necklace in the basin.
(1) 这个盆子是铁做的。(2) 他在盆里洗了手。(3) 他先在脸盆里倒了一些水。(4) 文水位于太原盆地以西。(5) 热带森林覆盖了整个河流流域。(6) 假如伊莉丝是对的，我需要将项链浸在水池里。

translation: n.基础；根据；基底
examples: (1) His research formed the basis of his new book.(2) We drew this conclusion on the basis of experiments.(3) What basis do you have for saying that?(4) Rates of work are calculated on a weekly basis.(5) This country's heavy industry rests on a broad and firm base.
(1) 他的研究成果是他这本新书的基础。(2) 我们是在试验的基础上得出这个结论的。(3) 你那样说有什么根据啊?(4) 工资是以周为计算基准的.(5) 这个国家的重工业有广泛坚实的底子。

translation: n.球棒；球拍n.蝙蝠v.用棒击打；拍打v.眨眼睛
examples: (1) He just tipped the ball with his bat.(2) The other boys coveted his new bat.(3) I want to buy a new tennis bat.(4) The bat together with the balls was stolen.(5) Bats fly at night and feed on insects.(6) Green batted for two hours on the playground.(7) The cat batted the balloon with its paws.(8) He was trying to bat the flies away with his newspaper.(9) I'll be a big farmer before you can bat an eye!(10) He heard the bad news without batting an eyelid.
(1) 他只是用球棒擦击来球。(2) 其他的男孩都想得到他的新球棒。(3) 我想要买一个新网球拍。(4) 球拍和球全被偷了。(5) 蝙蝠在夜间飞行，以昆虫为食。(6) 格林在赛场上执棒两小时。(7) 猫用爪子击打气球。(8) 他想用报纸把苍蝇打跑。(9) 他说你只要眨眨眼，我就马上变成一个富裕的庄稼人！(10) 他听到这个坏的消息丝毫没动声色(没贬眼睛)。

translation: n.洗澡；浴室；沐浴；浴盆v.洗澡Bath.n.巴斯(英国城市)
examples: (1) He takes a cold bath every day.(2) The idea came to him in his bath.(3) I want a double room with a bath.(4) After the bath, he took a walk in the yard.(5) The children like to have bubbles in their bath.(6) He was decorated with the Order of the Bath.(7) That sick personhas got a bath chair.(8) He will bath only after we fill the tub with toys.
(1) 他每天洗一个冷水澡。(2) 他洗澡时想出了这个主意。(3) 我要一间有浴室的双人房。(4) 沐浴后，他在院子里散步。(5) 孩子们喜欢浴盆里有肥皂泡。(6) 他被授以巴斯勋章。(7) 那个病人有一部巴斯轮椅。(8) 他只有在我们在浴盆中装满玩具后才洗澡。

translation: v.沐浴；用水洗；沉浸
examples: (1) And when Sparta burns, you shall bathe in gold.(2) The doctor advised him to bathe in the sun.s rays.(3) He took some time to bathe in short stories.
(1) 当斯巴达被火烧的时候，你们讲沐浴在黄金里。(2) 医生劝他沐浴阳光。(3) 他花了些时间沉浸在短篇小说里。

translation: n.浴衣；睡衣=dressing gown(美).
examples: (1) He threw on his bathrobe.
(1) 他匆匆穿上浴袍。

translation: n.浴室；洗手间
examples: (1) He weighed himself on the bathroom scales.(2) Steam has fogged the bathroom mirror.(3) There are two bathrooms in my house.(4) Every room in the hotel has a private bathroom.(5) We'll have one room with a bathroom and one room without.
(1) 他在浴室的磅秤上称体重。(2) 水蒸气把浴室里的镜子遮住了。(3) 我们家有两个浴室。(4) 旅馆中的每个房间都有一个单独浴室。(5) 我们要有一间带浴室的屋子，还要有一间不带浴室的。

translation: n.浴缸
examples: (1) Clean out the bathtub when you are done.
(1) 洗完澡后请把浴缸洗干净。

translation: n.电池；一系列；炮兵连；排炮；[律]殴打
examples: (1) They are electrifying the battery.(2) My car battery has run down; it needs recharging.(3) We would undergo a battery of tests.(4) A captain commands a company or battery.(5) An enemy battery zeroed in on the crossroad.(6) He was guilty of assault and battery.(7) A battery is any act done intentionally.
(1) 他们正给电池充电。(2) 我的汽车电池没电了，需要充电。(3) 我们要进行一系列试验。(4) 一个上尉指挥一个连队或炮兵连。(5) 敌人炮兵集中炮火于那个十字路口。(6) 他犯了殴打罪。(7) 殴打是故意行为。

translation: n.战斗；争斗v.与 ... 作战；与 ... 竞争
examples: (1) His brave deeds in the battle earned him everlasting glory.(2) He has proved his wit in the battle.(3) They battled with the wind and the waves.(4) Progress is slow but we keep battling on.
(1) 他在那场战斗中的英勇事迹为他赢得了永恒的荣誉。(2) 他已在这场争斗中证明了自己的睿智。(3) 他们与风浪搏斗。(4) 进展虽慢

translation: n.战场；战地
examples: (1) Sex, typically, was one battleground.(2) In the battleground,there is no place for hope.
(1) 两性问题是一个典型的战场。(2) 在战场上，没有所谓希望的地方。

translation: n.海湾；月桂树；隔间；犬吠；【计】机架，底板vi.嗥叫；哀号adj.红棕色
examples: (1) Sunlight shimmers on the waters of the bay.(2) We can see a magical view over the calm water of the bay from our window.(3) In the milk was a bay leaf, a few slices of onion.(4) In the library, the books on history are all kept in one bay.(5) There is a storage bay in the house.(6) We heard the distant bay of the hounds.(7) He is baying at the moon.(8) I heard the baying cry of a wolf.(9) It takes us a great deal of money to bay this new house.
(1) 阳光在海湾的水面上闪烁。(2) 从我们的窗户里可以看到海湾里平静海水的迷人景色。(3) 牛奶中也有一片月桂树叶和几片洋葱。(4) 在图书馆里，历史方面的书都放在同一隔间里。(5) 屋内有一个隔开的储藏间。(6) 我们听到远处一群猎犬的吠声。(7) 他朝着月亮吠叫。(8) 我听过狼的哀嚎。(9) 买这套新房子花掉我们很多钱。

translation: abbr.公元前(=Before Christ)=B.；C
examples: (1) abbr.公元前(=Before Christ)(2) =B.；C

translation: vi.微笑；发光vt.播送；发射；用梁支撑n.桁条；光线；(光线的)束；(横)梁
examples: (1) She beamed at me.(2) His face(He) is beaming with delight.(3) From a sky of untarnished blue the sun beamed down upon Beijing.(4) Television began beaming the national nominating conventions into the homes of Americans.(5) This is a programme beamed at Japan.(6) I beamed my flashlight into the corner and saw a mouse.(7) The transmitter will be beamed at Africa.(8) A rotary table helps to optimize the beam incidence angle.(9) A through beam illuminated the dark road ahead.(10) A ns pulse beam device is installed at pulse beam current piping.(11) He struck the beam with his head.(12) If you hit your head on that beam,you'll know it.

(1) 她对我微笑。(2) 他高兴得笑容满面。(3) 阳光透过万里碧空照耀着北京城。(4) 电视开始向美国家庭播放总统候选人全国提名大会的情况。(5) 这是对日本广播的节目。(6) 我把手电照向墙角,看见一只老鼠。(7) 这台发射机将用于对非洲广播。(8) 一张旋转的桌子有助于将光线影响之方式角最佳化。(9) 一束透射光照亮了前方黑暗的道路。(10) 在脉冲束流管道上安装有强流毫微秒脉冲化聚束装置。(11) 他的头撞到梁上了。(12) 头要是撞到梁上去了，就有你的好受。

translation: n.豆；豆科植物
examples: (1) Cocoa bean is used to make some kinds of drink.(2) A bean grows rapidly.(3) The bean plant is cultivated for animal fodder.
(1) 可可豆用于制作一些饮料。(2) 豆类植物生长很快。(3) 种植豆科植物可以用来当动物饲料。

translation: n.豆腐
examples: (1) I would also suggest Beancurd with pepper and chili sauce.(2) I think Mapo beancurd and shredded meat in chilli sauce are quite special.
(1) 我还建议您点个麻婆豆腐。(2) 我觉得麻婆豆腐和鱼香肉丝味道不错。

translation: n.胡须vt.公开反对；抓住胡须
examples: (1) Why don't you shave your beard off?(2) To my great amusement his false beard fell off.(3) He thought I was not brave enough to beard him, but he was wrong because I did it.(4) He bearded his boss and demanded an explanation.
(1) 你怎麽不把胡子刮掉?(2) 使我感到极其好笑的是他的假胡子掉下来了。(3) 他以为我没有那么大勇气向他挑战，但是他错了，我就这么做了。(4) 他公然蔑视上司，并要求他作出解释。

translation: n.兽；畜牲
examples: (1) The lion is called the king of beasts.(2) The hunters blocked up the hole of the beast.(3) He put the beast out and headed home.
(1) 狮子号称百兽之王。(2) 猎人堵住了兽穴。(3) 他把这只畜牲丢下，掉头就回家。

translation: n.美人；美丽；美的东西
examples: (1) Beauty's tears are lovelier than her smile.(2) His wife is an unmatched beauty.(3) Words cannot describe the beauty of the scene.(4) The beauty of the scene filled us with enchantment.(5) This bird cannot be paralled for beauty.(6) The beauty of living in California is that the weather is so good.(7) You have no feeling for the beauty of nature.
(1) 美人的泪水比微笑更可爱。(2) 他妻子是一个倾国倾城的美人。(3) 语言难以描述那景色之美丽。(4) 我们被美丽的景色迷住了。(5) 这鸟的美丽是无与伦比的。(6) 在加利福尼亚居住的好处就在于气候宜人。(7) 你对大自然的美缺乏欣赏力。

translation: n.铺盖；床单被褥类
examples: (1) The child burrowed under the bedclothes.(2) She crept in beside him under the bedclothes.(3) The bedclothes were tumbled as though the bed had been slept in.
(1) 那孩子在被窝里钻来钻去。(2) 她钻进被窝，躺在他身旁。(3) 床上的被褥都弄乱了，好像有人睡过觉。

translation: 垫料
examples: (1) The brook warbled over its rocky bed.(2) She rushed off to work leaving her bed unmade.(3) A mosquito netting completely surrounds our bed.(4) It was hard work getting the children off to bed.(5) I threw off my clothes and tumbled into bed.(6) I usually go to bed at half past ten.
(1) 小溪潺潺流过多石的河床。(2) 她匆忙去上班连床都没铺好。(3) 一顶蚊帐把我们的床完全围住了。(4) 哄孩子们去睡可不是容易的事。(5) 我脱掉衣服倒在床上便睡了。(6) 我通常十点半睡觉。

translation: n.蜜蜂n.集会
examples: (1) A bee pricks the skin with its sting.(2) He can hear the hum of the bee in the garden.
(1) 蜜蜂用螫针刺皮肤。(2) 他听得见花园里蜜蜂的嗡嗡声。

translation: n.蜂箱
examples: (1) We're just about to kick a beehive.(2) Tokyo is a human beehive of a city.(3) The dog stared at the beehive, barked, and wanted to climb up the tree.
(1) 我们就要捅马蜂窝了。(2) 东京是个像蜂窝般人囗集中而热闹的都市。(3) 这只狗一直望着那个蜂箱，狂吠着，想爬上树去。

translation: n.代表；利益；方面
examples: (1) The agent spoke on behalf of his principal.(2) On behalf of my colleagues and myself I thank you.(3) He agreed to testify on behalf of the accused man.(4) I put up the proposal on your behalf.(5) I made all these troubles in your behalf.(6) I intervened on her behalf to try to get the decision changed.(7) Jim gave the vote of thanks on behalf of the fellowship.(8) They threatened to become distressed sellers of large volumes of debt securities where they had been the biggest investors or had held assets on behalf of others.
(1) 代理人代表他的委托人说话。(2) 我代表我的同事和我本人向你表示感谢。(3) 他同意为被告作证。(4) 我是为你的利益才提出这个建议的。(5) 我是为了你才找这么多麻烦的。(6) 我为她力争，以求改变决定。(7) 在团体的利益方面，吉姆鼓掌表示感谢。(8) 它们威胁称，有可能被迫抛售大量债券，它们要么是这些债券的最大投资者，要么代表其它方面持有这些资产。

translation: v.表现；行为；举止
examples: (1) How is your new car behaving?(2) I'll trust you to behave responsibly while I'm out.(3) If you behave like that, you'll get yourself disliked.(4) It's hard to train children to behave well at the table.(5) I do not think it's proper for you to behave so.
(1) 你的新车性能如何？(2) 我相信你在我外出期间会认真办事的。(3) 如果你的行为那样，你会让人厌恶的。(4) 培养儿童用餐时举止得体是很困难的。(5) 我认为您这样的举止不合体统。

translation: n.行为；举止；品行=behavior
examples: (1) Such behaviour is beneath contempt.(2) What comments have you about my son's behaviour?(3) I could not endure the insolence of his behaviour.(4) His friendly behaviour was a cloak for his evil intentions.(5) We are surprised by his scandalous behaviour.(6) All of us like her for her beneficent behaviour.
(1) 这种行为令人不齿。(2) 你对我儿子的行为有什么意见？(3) 我不能再忍受他那傲慢无礼的行为了。(4) 他的友好行为不过是他险恶用心的伪装。(5) 我们很震惊他那令人反感的举止。(6) 因为她友善的品行，我们每个人都喜欢她。

translation: n.存在；人；生物；本质
examples: (1) I don't like being pent up in the house all the time.(2) It is fun eating by stealth without being found.(3) Earthenware has an advantage over wood in being more easily kept clean.(4) I have a feeling that we are being followed.(5) The ship was in imminent peril of being wrecked.(6) I detest violence with my whole being.(7) When did the world come into being?(8) What is the purpose of our being?
(1) 我不喜欢整天给关在屋子里。(2) 偷吃而不被人发现很有趣。(3) 陶器的优点在于比木器更容易保持清洁。(4) 我有种感觉我们正被人跟踪。(5) 那条船马上就有失事的危险。(6) 我毕生谴责暴力行为。(7) 世界是什么时候形成的？(8) 我们生存的目的是什么？

translation: n.比利时[欧洲]
examples: (1) The site of the battle of Waterloo is in Belgium.(2) Belgium has been called the cockpit of Europe.(3) We travelled through France and Belgium.(4) Belgium is not so large as France.
(1) 滑铁卢战役的遗址在比利时。(2) 比利时被称作欧洲战场。(3) 我们走遍了法国和比利时。(4) 比利时没有法国那么大。

translation: n.信念；信仰；相信
examples: (1) It bolstered my belief.(2) He acted in accordance with his beliefs.(3) His belief of communism is immovable.(4) His firmness on his belief supported him in difficulties.(5) There was a happy chime of belief and practice in everything she said.(6) He has lost his belief in God.(7) The story of his miseries is beyond my belief.
(1) 这增强了我的信念。(2) 他按照自己的信念行事。(3) 他坚定不移地信仰共产主义。(4) 困境中，他坚定的信仰支撑着他。(5) 她所说的每一件事都体现了信仰和行动的完美和谐。(6) 他已不相信上帝了。(7) 他的悲惨身世令人难以置信。

translation: n.钟；铃；门铃；钟声；钟状物vt.敲钟；使象钟状地张开vi.使呈钟状；张开
examples: (1) The church bell tolled the hour.(2) I was roused by the sound of the bell this morning.(3) I was too preoccupied to hear the bell.(4) The church bell calls up my wedding day.(5) The young monk clangs the bell every morning.(6) Lots of bell ringers were killed by lightning.(7) The thief got flurried,thinking that it was too bad to have produced the crashiing sound which would himself on the bell,trying to muffle the crashing sound with his arms.
(1) 教堂的鸣钟报时。(2) 今天早晨，我被铃声唤醒。(3) 当时我出神地想着心事，没有听见门铃响。(4) 教堂的钟声使我想起了我结婚的那天。(5) 年幼的和尚每天早晨当当地敲钟。(6) 许多敲钟人被闪电击毙。(7) 他心里一急，身子一下子扑到了钟上，张开双臂想捂住钟声，可钟声又怎么捂得住呢！

translation: n.腹部v.膨胀
examples: (1) My belly is empty.(2) A hungry belly has no ears.(3) The robber stabbed the young man in the belly.(4) The boat carried with much cargo in its belly.(5) The belly of the animal is covered in long piercing spikes.(6) The sails bellied in the wind.
(1) 我肚子饿了。(2) 人肚子饿了就听不进道理。(3) 强盗刺伤了这名年轻人的腹部。(4) 该船的舱里载了很多的货物。(5) 这种动物的腹部长满了锋利的长刺。(6) 帆在风中鼓得满满的。

translation: vi.应归入；属于
examples: (1) The daffodil belongs to the genus Narcissus.(2) Those documents belong with the sale report.(3) These boots belong in the closet.(4) What party do you belong to?(5) That dictionary belongs to me.(6) You and I belong to different political camps.(7) All these houses belong to the people's commune.
(1) 黄水仙是水仙属植物。(2) 那些文件归入销售报告。(3) 这些靴子应搁在壁橱里。(4) 你属于哪一党派？(5) 那本字典是属于我的。(6) 你和我属于不同的政治阵营。(7) 这些房子都是属于人民公社的。

translation: n.腰带；带状物；地带；皮带vt.用皮带抽打；用带系上；用带标示vi.疾驰；大声歌唱
examples: (1) He has a brown belt in karate.(2) A belt of trees grew between the two fields.(3) As Indonesia lies in the volcanic belt, earthquakes can occur.(4) My trousers only stay up if I wear a belt.(5) He strapped the driver with a leather belt.(6) The air hostess asked everyone to belt himself in.(7) They went belting along the road.
(1) 他有一条空手道的棕腰带。（他是空手道茶带）(2) 两块田之间有一条树木带。(3) 由于印尼位于火山地带,因此有发生地震的可能。(4) 我这条裤子要是不系皮带就往下掉。(5) 他用皮带抽打司机。(6) 空中小姐要求大家扣好安全带。(7) 他们沿着马路疾驰而去。

translation: n.长凳；工作台；法官
examples: (1) This bench is made of elm.(2) An old man sat on the park bench and fed the pigeon.(3) A young woman, of sullen aspect, was sitting alone on the bench.(4) I'm glad the new trainee is keen but I wish he'd stop hanging around my bench and getting in my hair.(5) The bench read the sentence to the criminal.(6) She has recently been appointed to the bench.
(1) 这条长凳是榆木制的。(2) 一位老人坐在公园的长凳上喂鸽子。(3) 一个面色忧郁的年轻女人独自坐在长凳上。(4) 新来的受训者很敏捷，我很满意，不过我希望他别再我工作台周围闲荡，使我觉得烦恼。(5) 法官向罪犯宣读了判决。(6) 她最近当上了法官。

translation: v.弯曲；使弯曲；屈服；屈从；集中于n.弯曲；弯道
examples: (1) The branches bent in the wind.(2) The branch bent but didn't break when the boy climbed along it.(3) They refused to bend to the hijackers' demands.(4) She can't bend him to her will.(5) He could not bend his mind to his studies .(6) The stream takes a sudden bend to the east.(7) There is a sharp bend in the road here.
(1) 树枝被风吹弯了。(2) 那男孩爬上树枝时，树枝弯曲了，但是没有折断。(3) 他们拒绝屈从于劫机者的要求。(4) 她无法使他服从自己的意志。(5) 他不能专心于他的功课。(6) 小溪突然转向东流。(7) 这段路上有一处急转弯。

translation: prep.在 ... 之下；被...覆盖；低于...；不值得adv.在下方；在底下
examples: (1) They found the body buried beneath a pile of leaves.(2) The earth lay beneath a blanket of snow.(3) He is beneath his brother intellectually.(4) Such behaviour is beneath contempt.(5) He shrugged off my criticism as though it was beneath his notice.(6) Her careful make-up hid the signs of age beneath.(7) We looked down from the plane at the fields spread out beneath.
(1) 他们在一堆树叶下面发现了那具尸体。(2) 大地被厚厚的白雪覆盖。(3) 他在智力方面不如他兄弟。(4) 这种行为令人不齿。(5) 他不理睬我的批评,好像我的批评不值得他一顾似的。(6) 她的精心化妆掩饰了脂粉下面岁月刻下的痕迹。(7) 我们从飞机上俯瞰下面一片片的土地。

translation: adj.有利的；有益的
examples: (1) It's a beneficial result to us.(2) Word of mouth advertising is the most beneficial.(3) Calcium is beneficial to our bones.(4) Fresh air is beneficial to our health.
(1) 对我们来说那是有利的结果。(2) 口碑广告是最有利的。(3) 钙对我们的骨骼有益。(4) 新鲜空气有益于健康。

translation: n.利益；津贴；义演；保险金；借助vt.有益于；得益
examples: (1) It was for the benefit of your company that we did that.(2) Applications for unemployment benefits dropped last month.(3) A benefit performance will be held tonight.(4) The unemployed are entitled to receive other unemployment insurance benefits during the period of receiving unemployment insurance compensation.(5) It was achieved with the benefit of modern technology.(6) The new hospital will benefit the entire community.(7) A large number of students will benefit from the new teaching method.
(1) 我们这样做都是为了你们公司的利益。(2) 上个月申请失业津贴的人数下降了。(3) 今晚有义演。(4) 失业人员在领取失业保险金期间,按照规定同时享受其他失业保险待遇。(5) 借助现代技术,这个目标已经达到。(6) 新医院将有益于整个社区。(7) 多数学生将从这个新的教学方法中得益。

translation: bend的过去式和过去分词.adj.下定决心的；弯曲的n.嗜好
examples: (1) He's bent on completing his essay.(2) She is bent on becoming a film star when she grows up.(3) Just as the twig is bent, the tree is inclined.(4) The bent strip can straighten up by itself.(5) He has a bent for art.
(1) 他决心要写完他的随笔。(2) 她一心想长大后当一名影星。(3) 弯曲的树苗长成弯曲的树。(4) 这弯曲的金属片能自己变直。(5) 他生性爱好艺术。

translation: prep.除 ... 之外adv.此外；也
examples: (1) No one writes to me besides you.(2) There will be five of us for dinner, besides John.(3) He has been to Mexico but nowhere besides.(4) He gave me a book,a pen and some money besides.(5) I haven't time to see the film besides, it had dreadful reviews.
(1) 除你以外，没有人给我写信。(2) 除约翰外，还有我们五个人要一起吃饭。(3) 他曾去过墨西哥但没去过别的地方。(4) 他给我一本书，一支钢笔，此外还给一些钱。(5) 我没有时间去看这部影片--再说，影评也诸多贬斥。

translation: vt.背叛；出卖；泄露；显露
examples: (1) He betrayed his country.(2) He promised never to betray the organization.(3) He was seduced to betray his friend.(4) As long as you don't betray me, I'll do whatever you ask me to.(5) A friend does not betray confidences.(6) His accent betrayed the fact that he was foreign.(7) The smoke from cooking betrayed the presence of the enemy.
(1) 他背叛了他的国家。(2) 他发誓永不背叛组织。(3) 他受唆使而出卖朋友。(4) 只要你不出卖我,要我做什么我都愿意。(5) 朋友是不会泄露秘密的(6) 他的口音显露出他是外国人。(7) 炊烟暴露了敌人的存在。

translation: prep.超出；远于；除 ... 之外；超出…之外adv.在更远处；另外n.远处；来世
examples: (1) The level of inflation has gone beyond 8%.(2) Such philosophical subtleties are beyond my reach.(3) The scenery there was beautiful beyond expression.(4) He's got nothing beyond his state pension.(5) I don't notice anything beyond his rather strange accent.(6) They crossed the mountains and travelled to the valleys beyond.(7) The immediate future is clear, but it's hard to tell what lies beyond.(8) Another unidentified source, seen below the galactic plane, is likely beyond the boundaries of the Milky Way.(9) The localisation extends beyond a Swedish language poker client, with Party Poker additionally offering full Swedish-speaking support.(10) In future, men can travel to the moon and beyond.(11) What can we know of the beyond?

(1) 通货膨胀率已经超过了8%。(2) 这种深奥的哲理我可无法理解。(3) 那儿的风景美丽得无法形容。(4) 除了国家发的养老金，他一无所有。(5) 除了他那颇为古怪的口音以外,我没注意到别的。(6) 他们越过群山，到了那边的山谷。(7) 近期内的情况很清楚,但很难说以后如何。(8) 另外一个处在银河盘面下方的未被命名的伽马源，大概在银河系的边界之外。(9) 本地化延伸超越瑞典语扑克客户端，与党扑克另外提供充分讲瑞典语的支持。(10) 未来人们能到月球或更远处去旅行。(11) 我们对来世能知道些什么呢？

translation: n.自行车vi.骑自行车
examples: (1) Can you ride a bicycle?(2) He beguiled me into lending him my bicycle.(3) Every day he rode his old bicycle to his office.(4) You can coast downhill on a bicycle.(5) I saw him make by the gate on his bicycle.
(1) 你会骑自行车吗？(2) 他骗我把自行车借给了他。(3) 每天他骑着他那辆旧自行车去上班。(4) 你可以骑自行车滑下坡。(5) 我看见他骑自行车从大门旁边过去了。

translation: v.（买方）出价；投标；吩咐；叫牌n.出价；努力；叫牌
examples: (1) She bid 500 for the painting.(2) Several firms have bid for the contract to build the new concert hall.(3) Several companies are bidding for the contract to build the bridge.(4) Do as you are bidden.(5) I bid two hearts.(6) He made a bid of 50 for a painting.(7) A bid higher than another bid.(8) He failed in his bid to reach the summit.(9) It's your bid next.
(1) 她喊价500买这幅画。(2) 有几家公司投标，争取建造新音乐厅的合同。(3) 有几家公司在投标争取承包建桥工程。(4) 按照吩咐你的去做。(5) 我叫两红心。(6) 他为一幅画出价50英镑。(7) 过高的出价比其它的价高的出价(8) 他攀登顶峰未能成功.(9) 轮到你叫牌了。

translation: n.宾果游戏int.看吧！瞧！（因出乎意料的成功而表示兴奋的叫声）
examples: (1) I'll hazard a dollar on the bingo game.(2) It is now available at Bingo Runner.
(1) 我在这局宾果游戏上赌一元钱。(2) 它现在是可利用的在宾果游戏赛跑者。

translation: n.生物化学
examples: (1) Her research is breaking new ground in biochemistry.(2) I am going to start my doctorate in biochemistry next year.
(1) 她的研究正在开辟生物化学的新开地。(2) 我准备明年开始攻读生物化学博士学位。

translation: n.传记
examples: (1) He likes to read biographies of great men to promote himself.(2) His biography is a saga of scientific research.(3) I have read a biography of Abraham Lincoln.
(1) 他喜欢读伟人传记来提高自己。(2) 他的传记就是一部科研记实。(3) 我读过一部亚伯拉罕•林肯的传记。

translation: n.鸟笼；机场附近受控制的空中交通空间
examples: (1) I want to put two birds in my new birdcage.(2) He keeps a parrot in a birdcage in his living room.
(1) 我想在我新的鸟笼里养两只鸟。(2) 他在客厅的鸟笼里养了一只鹦鹉。

translation: n.分娩；出生；诞生；血统v.分娩；产生adj.有血亲关系的
examples: (1) Gestation extends from fertilization to birth.(2) Many of the women died in child birth in the past.(3) My daughter's birth was ecstatic.(4) By accident of birth she was rich.(5) This painting depicts the birth of Venus.(6) There is a mystique about the birth of a new star.(7) She is English by birth but French by marriage.(8) Gestation extends from fertilization to birth.(9) During the birth she was given gas and air.(10) The era also gave birth to a whole array of new social problems.(11) Every dragon gives birth to a St. George who slays it.

(1) 妊娠期系指从配种到分娩之间的时间。(2) 在过去，许多妇女死于分娩。(3) 我女儿的出生令人欣喜。(4) 她有幸出生于富裕人家。(5) 这幅画描绘的是维纳斯的诞生。(6) 一个新明星的诞生总是显得神秘。(7) 她是英国血统，但嫁给法国人而入了法国籍。(8) 妊娠期系指从配种到分娩之间的时间。(9) 她分娩时用了麻醉混合气体。(10) 那个时代还产生了一系列新的社会问题。(11) 每一条龙都会产生出一个屠龙的圣乔治。

translation: n.出生地；发源地
examples: (1) He has a sentimental attachment to his birthplace.(2) The house is wrongly reputed to have been the poet's birthplace.(3) Ronda is the birthplace of modern bullfighting.
(1) 他对他的出生地有眷恋之情。(2) 这所房子被误以为是诗人的出生地。(3) 朗达是现代西班牙斗牛场的发源地。

translation: n.饼干；淡褐色
examples: (1) He had some biscuits before the dinner.(2) I caught her with her fingers in the biscuit tin.(3) Children like to eat the biscuit.
(1) 晚饭前，他吃了一些饼干。(2) 我看见她手指还在饼干盒里呢。(3) 孩子们喜欢吃饼干。

translation: n.主教；(国际象棋中的)象
examples: (1) This priest wants to become a bishop.(2) The new church was consecrated by the Bishop of Chester.(3) He moved his bishop to take the pawn.(4) Chess includes rook, knight, bishop, queen, king and pawn.
(1) 这位牧师想成为主教。(2) 在切斯特的主教主持下举行了新教堂的奉献礼。(3) 他走象，吃掉了卒。(4) 国际象棋有车、马、象、后、王和卒。

translation: v.咬；叮；蜇n.咬；一口；(被咬的)伤痕
examples: (1) Their dog bit a hole in my trousers.(2) He was taken to the hospital to be treated for snake bite.(3) I'm stuffed, and I can't eat another bite.
(1) 他们的狗把我的裤子咬了个窟窿。(2) 他因遭蛇咬而被送到医院治疗。(3) 我很饱了,一口也吃不下了。

translation: adj.苦的；痛苦的；辛酸的；激烈的adv.激烈地；极其vt.使变苦n.苦涩；苦酒；苦的东西
examples: (1) The medicine has a bitter taste.(2) The defeat was a bitter pill to swallow.(3) She wept bitter tears over the loss of her lover.(4) Her voice took on a sudden bitter note.(5) His story brought back our bitter past .(6) The bitter quarrel ended their friendship.(7) He is bitter in his condemnation of terrorism.(8) It has stopped snowing, but there's a bitter cold wind.(9) Green tea, unlike black tea, has not been oxidized and can easily turn bitter if not made properly.(10) The star is called Wormwood, and a third of the waters was turned into wormwood and many people died because of the water which had turned bitter.(11) He has tasted the sweets and bitters of life.(12) I like the coffee to taste a little bitter.(13) In the past, however, most medicines were very bitter tasting.

(1) 这药有苦味。(2) 那次失败是一次难以吞咽的苦果。(3) 她为失去了她的情人而流下痛苦的眼泪。(4) 她的声音带着一股出意料的辛酸语气。(5) 他的事使我们想起辛酸的往事。(6) 那场激烈的争吵结束了他的友谊。(7) 他言辞激烈地谴责恐怖主义。(8) 已经停止下雪啦,不过,还刮着刺骨的寒风。(9) 绿茶与红茶不同，没有经过发酵氧化，如果处理不当很容易发涩变苦。(10) 于是水的三分之一变成苦的，许多人因水变苦了而死去。(11) 他已尝遍了人生的甜酸苦辣。(12) 我喜欢喝起来有点苦的咖啡。(13) 然而，在过去，大部分的药都是非常苦的。

translation: vt.责备；把 ... 归咎于n.责备；过失
examples: (1) The driver was not to blame for the accident.(2) The bank manager was really to blame, though he tried to pin it on a clerk.(3) She blamed him for the failure of their marriage.(4) We were ready to take the blame for what had happened.(5) He incurred much blame for his stubborn attitude.(6) It was wrong of you to fasten the blame on him.(7) She tried to shunt the blame onto Miss Williams.
(1) 这次事故怪不着司机。(2) 真正受责备的应该是银行经理，可是他却想把责任推到一个职员身上。(3) 她把婚姻的触礁归咎於他。(4) 我们准备对所发生的事承担责任。(5) 他态度顽固而招致许多责难。(6) 你把过错推到他头上是不对的。(7) 她试图把责任推至威廉姆斯小姐身上。

translation: adj.空白的；茫然的空白；空白处
examples: (1) Give me a blank sheet of paper, please.(2) Many blank spaces are still left in the suburbs.(3) Her explanations were met with blank incomprehension.(4) His expression remained studiously blank.(5) My life before that is a blank to me.(6) Write your name in the blank.
(1) 请给我一张空白的纸。(2) 郊区仍留有许多空地。(3) 大家对她的解释茫然不解。(4) 他的表情仍是那种故作茫然状。(5) 那以前的生活对我来说已是一片空白。(6) 在空白栏中写上你的名字。

translation: n.毛毯；覆盖物；排字版vt.覆盖；用毯子裹；扑灭；挡风；使包含adj.包含所有的；适用于所有情形的
examples: (1) He threw a blanket over the injured man.(2) They cuddled up (together) under the blanket.(3) The nurse carried in a baby wrapped (up) in a warm blanket.(4) The ground was covered by a thick blanket of snow.(5) Covering much of the earth's surface is a blanket of water.(6) The countryside was blanketed with snow/fog.(7) Dark clouds blanketed the summit of the downs.(8) She sat by the fire, swaddled in a blanket.(9) He blanketed the grease fire with sand.(10) A blanket insurance policy insures a car against all kinds of accidents.
(1) 他急忙给受伤的人披上条毯子。(2) 他们盖著毯子(在一起)搂著。(3) 保母抱著个孩子进来，孩子身上裹著暖暖的毯子。(4) 地面上覆盖着厚厚的一层雪。(5) 覆盖大部分地球表面的是水。(6) 乡村被雪[雾]覆盖著。(7) 乌云盖住了丘陵的顶部。(8) 她用毯子裹住身子，坐在火炉旁。(9) 他用沙子扑灭了油火。(10) 一张综合保险单担保汽车一切意外事件。

translation: v.流血；渗色；榨取；放掉（水或气体）；给...抽血
examples: (1) All the young soldiers are ready to bleed for the country.(2) If you cut your finger it will bleed.(3) A page trimmed so as to bleed.(4) The tax man is trying to bleed me white.(5) You should bleed your radiator before and after every winter.(6) Doctors used to bleed people when they were sick.(7) In the Middle Ages, doctors used to bleed people for medical treatment.
(1) 所有的年轻战士都愿意为祖国洒热血。(2) 如果你割破手指,那么它会流血的。(3) 被剪裁的页次经切裁以印成出血版的纸页(4) 税务员正想榨尽我的血汗。(5) 你应该在每个冬季前后排空暖气管里的水。(6) 过去人们生病时,医生给他们放血。(7) 在中世纪，医生常给病人放血进行治疗。

translation: vt.保佑；祝福；赐福；有幸具有
examples: (1) God bless you!(2) May the gods bless this grateful heart!(3) May Lord bless all of us who are in misfortune!(4) The priest blessed the ship before it left port.(5) To give me your heart, and bless me with your love!(6) I will bless her and give you a son by her.(7) But God wants to bless you today.
(1) 愿上帝保佑你！(2) 愿神祗保佑这深明大义的孩子。(3) 愿天主保佑我们这些苦难的人吧！(4) 牧师在船离港之前为其祝福。(5) 给我你的心,用你的爱来祝福我吧!(6) 我要赐福给她，让她为你生一个儿子。(7) 然而，神是要在今天赐福予你。

translation: n.街区；木块；石块；大楼；一组；阻塞(物)；障碍(物)v.阻塞
examples: (1) Walk two blocks down the street and go past the city hall.(2) The doctors succeeded in confining the contagious disease within the block.(3) The floor was made of wooden blocks.(4) The blocks should be laid on a bed of concrete.(5) The chief stumbling block to his promotion is his lack of qualifications.
(1) 顺这条街走两个街区，过市政厅。(2) 医生们成功地将这个传染病控制在这一街区的范围内。(3) 地板是用木块拼成的。(4) 石块应该固定在混凝土基座上。(5) 他晋升的主要障碍是他的资格不够。

translation: n.血；血统；仇恨vt.流血
examples: (1) The dog's fur was matted with blood.(2) She was sick at the sight of the blood.(3) A drop of blood slid down his leg.(4) The wounded man was covered with blood.(5) He has oriental blood in his veins.(6) They are not of the same blood.(7) Someone told me that she has royal blood.(8) There is a lot of bad blood between those two families.(9) He did not want to see any American blood spilt.
(1) 那只狗的毛皮上沾有血迹。(2) 她一见到血就感到恶心。(3) 他的腿上流着一点儿血。(4) 这个受伤的人身上全是血。(5) 他是东方血统。(6) 他们并非同宗。(7) 有人告诉我她有贵族血统。(8) 这两家人积怨太深。(9) 他不想看到任何美国人流血牺牲。

translation: n.木板；布告板；董事会；船舷或机舱；伙食；舞台v.登(飞机、车、船等)；接受乘客；有偿提供食宿；搭伙；用木板覆盖
examples: (1) Will you draw the nails from this board?(2) Paste down the map on the board.(3) Her election to the board of directors caused great surprise.(4) Please get on board at once; the plane is taking off very soon.(5) She pays $100 a week plus room and board.(6) For ambitious actors, playing on the boards is the greatest happiness in their life.(7) Passengers must board the ship by 6 p.m.(8) The passenger walk up the ramp to board the airplane.(9) Flight 757 is now boarding.(10) We will be very glad to board and lodge you.(11) I'd board up the windows if I were you.

(1) 请你把钉子从这块木板上拔出来好吗?(2) 把这张地图用浆糊贴在布告板上。(3) 她被选进董事会,令人大为吃惊。(4) 请即刻登机；飞机马上就要起飞了。(5) 她每星期付100美元,另加食宿。(6) 对怀着雄心壮志的演员来说,在舞台上表演是他们生命中最大的快乐。(7) 旅客必须在下午六点钟以前上船。(8) 旅客们走上活动舷梯登上飞机。(9) 757航班的乘客请现在登机。(10) 我们很高兴为您提供食宿。(11) 如果我要是你的话,我就用木板把窗户钉上。

translation: n.健身；健美运动=bodybuilding； body building.
examples: (1) Guide exercises can build our body.(2) The process of developing the musculature of the body through specific types of diet and physical exercise,such as weightlifting,especially for competitive exhibition.
(1) 做导引运动具有健身功效。(2) 健美运动通过特殊饮食和锻炼，如举重，使肌肉发达的过程，尤指为了竞赛性的展示。

translation: v.沸腾；煮沸；激动n.煮沸；翻滚；疖
examples: (1) The kettle is boiling.(2) This new type of electromagnetic boiler takes only 3 minutes to boil water.(3) The mere idea made me boil.(4) Give the sheets a good boil to get them white.(5) Bring the mixture to the boil, then let it simmer for ten minutes.(6) The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.(7) The boil on your face has headed.
(1) 壶里的水开了。(2) 这样的新型电磁炉煮沸一锅水只用3分钟。(3) 这个主意让我大为激动。(4) 把被单好好煮一煮，好让它们白一些。(5) 把混合物煮至沸腾,然后再用文火煮十分钟。(6) 每当我写字的时候，右臂上的疖子就使我感到疼痛。(7) 你脸上的小疖子已经出脓头了。

translation: n.炸弹vt.轰炸；投弹于vi.投弹；失败
examples: (1) The bomb exploded in a twinkling.(2) The terrorists planted a bomb in the post office.(3) The city was bombed by the enemy.(4) Our parents were bombed out twice during the war.(5) The terrorists planted a bomb in the post office.(6) The airforce bombed two towns.(7) The play bombed.(8) Their new products bombed on the home market.
(1) 炸弹一会儿就爆炸了。(2) 恐怖分子在邮局安放了一枚炸弹。(3) 这座城市被敌人炸毁了。(4) 我们的父母在战争期间有两次被炸弹炸得无家可归。(5) 恐怖分子在邮局安放了一枚炸弹。(6) 空军轰炸了两个城镇。(7) 这台戏演砸了(8) 他们的新产品在国内市场销售失败。

translation: n.债券；结合；协定；联系；情谊；黏合剂vt.使结合；为 ... 作保vi.连结；粘合
examples: (1) An industrial firm issues bond to collect money and will pay back with interest.(2) Marriage should be a permanent bond.(3) We entered into a solemn bond.(4) Common interests formed a bond between us.(5) And so is the bond that united them in days of sickness.(6) The modified larch bark tannin extracts can be used in production of bakelite bond.(7) Antioxidants that numberrepresentationof with transfromer in the binders, you increase the bond and permealbe, and dampproof and antimould can be achieved.(8) The company refused to bond a former criminal.(9) I use water resistant adhesive to get the best bond possible.(10) In the ethyne molecule, a double bond links together the two carbon atoms.(11) These two different materials won't bond together.

(1) 工厂发行债券集资并偿还利息。(2) 婚姻应该是永恒的结合。(3) 我们缔结了一项正式协定。(4) 共同的利益把我们联系在一起。(5) 在她卧床不起的日子里，她和小猫建立起来的情谊依然存在。(6) 可应用于酚醛树脂绝缘板的黏合剂生产。(7) 氧化剂使黏合剂中带有极性基团，可以提高黏结力及渗透性，并可以达到防潮和防霉的作用。(8) 这家公司拒绝为一个前科罪犯作保。(9) 我使用防水粘合剂，以获得最佳连结性。(10) 在乙烯分子中是由一个双键将两个碳原子连结在一起的。(11) 这两种不同材料粘合不起来。

translation: n.骨骼；骨；核心vt.除去骨头；往衣服里加撑条；磨光表面vi.努力学习adv.非常地；极其地
examples: (1) Scientists have dated the fossils by their bone structure.(2) He broke a bone in his leg.(3) The fish bone in her throat made her choke.(4) My English teacher is the backbone of our school.(5) Next time, ask the butcher to bone the meat.(6) Will you bone this joint of meat for me?(7) Please bone these coats.(8) I must bone up on my French before we go to Paris.(9) He had to bone up on his French.(10) I need to bone up on my English.(11) He is bone idle.(12) I am bone tired.

(1) 科学家根据那些化石的骨骼结构确定其年代。(2) 他摔断了一根腿骨。(3) 她喉咙中的鱼骨使她哽噎。(4) 我的英语老师是我们学校的骨干教师。(5) 下次让卖肉的把肉里的骨头剔出来。(6) 你能帮我把这块肉的骨头剔掉吗?(7) 把这些外套用东西撑起了。(8) 在我们去巴黎之前，我必须刻苦学习法语－。(9) 他不得不死记硬背法文。(10) 我得好好学英语。(11) 他非常懒惰。(12) 我累死了。

translation: n.红利；意外所得之物；奖金；【篮】追加罚篮
examples: (1) The firm offered her a generous bonus as a sweetener.(2) He received a box of cookies as a bonus when he bought coffee at the shop.(3) The firm repaid her hard work with a bonus.(4) The firm recognized Tom's outstanding work by giving him an extra bonus.
(1) 公司提出给她一笔可观的花红借以拉拢她。(2) 他在商店买咖啡时,意外地得到了一盒免费赠送的饼干。(3) 公司发给她奖金以酬谢她的辛勤工作。(4) 公司发给汤姆一笔额外奖金以表彰他出色的工作。

translation: n.书架；书柜
examples: (1) He improvised a bookcase out of crates.(2) There are many books on the bookcase.(3) A bookcase screens off part of the room.
(1) 他用板条箱临时做成书架。(2) 书架上有很多书。(3) 有个书柜把房间隔开了一部分。

translation: n.书架
examples: (1) A sunbeam rests on the bookshelf.(2) She began neatening the books in the low bookshelf.
(1) 一道阳光照在书架上。(2) 她开始整理放在矮书架上的书。

translation: n.书店=bookshop.
examples: (1) He never went to the bookstore without buying some books.(2) He sold a bundle of old magazines to the second hand bookstore.(3) I spent hours browsing in the bookstore.
(1) 他没有一次到书店而不买一些书。(2) 他把一捆就杂志卖给了旧书店。(3) 我花了几个小时在书店里浏览图书。

translation: n.繁荣；兴旺；激增；低沉声n.帆杠；吊杆；支臂；尾桁；水栅vi.急速增长；发出低沉声vt.使兴旺；促进
examples: (1) He made his pile during the property boom.(2) The oil market is enjoying a boom.(3) City growth far outran the general population boom.(4) We heard the sonic boom of a jet overhead.(5) The boom swung over the deck.(6) Please swing the boom overside.(7) The long boom of the crane functions like our arms.(8) The boom of the airplane was damaged.(9) Business is booming.(10) The tower clock boomed out twelve.(11) Foreign investments boomed the city.(12) This boom in adult education, in turn, helps to raise the intellectual standard of the whole country.(13) The entente, which has brought better communications with Spain, has helped to fuel the boom.

(1) 在房地产生意兴隆期间他发了大财。(2) 石油市场欣欣向荣。(3) 城市的发展大大超过总的人口激增。(4) 我们听见头顶上飞机发出轰鸣声。(5) 帆杠在甲板上转动。(6) 请把吊杆甩到外档。(7) 起重机的长臂与我们的手臂功能相同。(8) 飞机的尾桁受到损害。(9) 商业正日趋繁荣。(10) 塔楼上的大钟沉重地敲了十二下。(11) 国外投资使这个城市迅速繁荣起来。(12) 而成人教育热反过来又促进了整个国家文化水平的提高。(13) 那项协议使得与西班牙的联系得到加强，这有助于促进当地的经济繁荣。

translation: n.货摊；电话亭；小间
examples: (1) Would you please watch over my booth?(2) I'll give him a call from the phone booth on the corner.(3) It happened that there was a telephone booth nearby.(4) They sat in a corner booth, away from other diners.
(1) 请您照料一下我的摊位好吗?(2) 我到街角的电话亭给他打个电话。(3) 碰巧在附近有个公用电话亭。(4) 他们坐在餐厅角落的小隔间里，与别的就餐者分开。

translation: n.边界；边境；边缘vt.与 ... 接壤；加边于vi.近似；毗邻
examples: (1) We have a herbaceous border round our garden.(2) A series of provocations led up to the border war.(3) Enemy troops raided our border areas.(4) I lost a white handkerchief with a blue border.(5) France borders Germany along parts of the Rhine.(6) Some of his statements are so incorrect that they border on fraudulence.(7) Our garden is bordered on one side by a stream.
(1) 我们的花园四周种有草本植物。(2) 一系列的挑衅事件导致了边境战争的发生。(3) 敌军对我边境地区进行袭击。(4) 我丢了一块带蓝色花边的白手绢。(5) 法国沿莱茵河部分河段与德国接壤。(6) 他的某些说法非常不正确以致近乎欺诈。(7) 我们的花园有一边以小河为界。

translation: adj.无聊的；厌烦的；郁闷的
examples: (1) Some people use their teisure for such activities because they are lonely or bored.(2) He is a bored student.
(1) 有些人因为寂寞或无聊,才利用闲暇时间从事这些活动。(2) 他是一位感到厌烦的学生。

translation: n.老板；上司；首脑v.管理；指挥
examples: (1) My boss is a football fan.(2) He was fired by his boss.(3) He is my sometime boss.(4) Bob liked to boss the young man about.(5) Don't boss me around! What do you take me for?
(1) 我的上司是一位足球迷。(2) 他被他的老板解雇了。(3) 他是我从前的上司。(4) 鲍伯喜爱对那位年轻人发号施令。(5) 别把我使唤来使唤去的!你当我是什么?

translation: adj.植物学的；植物的n.植物制剂
examples: (1) My botanical interest is largely confined to the reproductive processes in vascular plants.(2) De Bary abandoned a career in medicine in Frankfurt to devote the rest of his life to his botanical studies, becoming professor of botany at a number of German universities.(3) My botanical interest is largely confined to the reproductive processes in vascular plants.
(1) 我对植物学的兴趣主要限于维管植物的生殖过程。(2) 它放弃了在法兰克福医学的研究转向植物学的研究，后来成为好几所德国大学的植物学教授。(3) 我对植物学的兴趣主要限于维管植物的生殖过程。

translation: n.植物学；植物
examples: (1) To what degree are you interested in botany?(2) In learning botany, I understand much about nature.(3) Botany deals with the study of plants.(4) He taught Irene botany and natural history.
(1) 你对植物学的兴趣达到什么程度？(2) 学习植物学使我对大自然了解了许多。(3) 植物学论述植物的研究。(4) 他教绮瑞娜认识植物和学习自然史。

translation: n.底部；底端adj.底部的v.触底；打(基础)
examples: (1) There are tea leaves in the bottom of my cup.(2) They sent the enemy ship to the bottom of the sea.(3) He was always bottom of the class in maths.(4) Put your books on the bottom shelf.(5) There is no sign that the recession has bottomed out yet.(6) We wanted to bottom our plan on a solid basis.
(1) 我的杯底有茶叶。(2) 他们把敌舰击沉。(3) 他的数学成绩在班上总是垫底。(4) 把你的书放在最下层的架子上.(5) 没有迹象表明萧条已经到了极点。(6) 我们想把我们的计划建立在牢固的基础上。

translation: vi.弹起；重新恢复；退票vt.使弹起；解雇；驱逐n.弹跳；弹力；活力
examples: (1) The ball hit the wall and bounced off it.(2) She's had many misfortunes in her life but she always bounces back.(3) He is young enough to bounce back from this disappointment.(4) I hope this cheque doesn't bounce.(5) I bounced the baby on my knee.(6) After starting a fight, he was bounced from the pub.(7) The volleyball gave a high bounce.(8) There's not much bounce left in these balls.(9) She came back full of confidence and bounce.
(1) 球打在墙上又反弹回来。(2) 她一生中经历过许多挫折，然而总是能重新振作起来。(3) 他很年轻，能够从这次挫折中恢复过来。(4) 我希望这张支票别遭退票(5) 我把婴儿放在膝上上下颠着。(6) 在打架闹事後,他被酒廊逐出来。(7) 排球高高地弹起来。(8) 这些球已没有多少弹性了。(9) 她回来了,充满了自信和活力。

translation: adj.必定的；有义务的；受约束的；装订的vi.跳；跳跃前进；猛涨n.跳跃；范围；界限动词bind的过去式和过去分词形式
examples: (1) It's bound to rain soon.(2) You are not legally bound to answer these questions.(3) He bought a bound volume of the magazine.(4) The dog bounded down the hill.(5) Polly came bounding into the room holding a letter.(6) He predicted that the stock market would be sure to bound ahead.(7) With one bound, he was over the wall.(8) He reached popularity at a bound, while still a youth.(9) I will try my best within the bound of my abilities.(10) There are no bounds to his ambition.
(1) 过一会儿肯定会下雨。(2) 在法律上，你没有义务非回答这些问题不可。(3) 他买了一本该杂志的合订本。(4) 狗跳跃着朝山下跑去。(5) 波利手上拿着一封信,蹦蹦跳跳地跑进了房间。(6) 他预测股市肯定会一路猛涨。(7) 他纵身一跃就跳过了墙。(8) 当他还很年轻的时候,就一举成名了。(9) 我将在我的能力范围内竭尽全力。(10) 他的野心是无止境的。

translation: n.边界；分界线
examples: (1) We crossed the state boundary at midnight.(2) They marked the boundaries of the football fields.(3) Scientists continue to push back the boundaries of knowledge.(4) The lane is the boundary of our land from theirs.(5) The fence marks the boundary between my land and hers.
(1) 我们在午夜穿过了州界。(2) 他们画出了足球场地的边界。(3) 科学家不断地把知识领域的边缘向外扩展。(4) 那条小路就是我们这片地与他们那片地的分界线。(5) 这道栅栏是我的地和她的地的分界线。

translation: n.弓；鞠躬礼；蝴蝶结；船头v.鞠躬；致敬；压弯
examples: (1) At that time, people hunt with bows and arrows.(2) He moved aside for her with a polite bow.(3) She has a dress decorated with bows.(4) The yacht hit a rock and damaged her bows.(5) The cast bowed as the audience applauded.(6) Every one bowed as the Queen walked into the room.(7) Those branches were bowed down by the snow on them.
(1) 在那时,人们以弓﹑ 箭行猎。(2) 他礼貌地鞠躬，退避一旁让她过去。(3) 她有一条饰有蝴蝶结的连衣裙。(4) 游艇碰上了礁石，撞坏了船头。(5) 演员们向鼓掌的观众鞠躬。(6) 女王走进房间时，每个人都鞠躬致敬。(7) 那些树枝被覆盖着的积雪压弯了.

translation: n.保龄球
examples: (1) Prinne was tired after bowling for half an hour.(2) Jerry and Marcy are bowling on bowling night.
(1) 普林玩了半个钟头保龄球戏后觉得累了。(2) 杰瑞和玛西在保龄球之夜打保龄球。

translation: n.拳击；盒式包装；制箱材料
examples: (1) I enjoyed all the sports with the exception of boxing.(2) He was done out of the right of boxing.
(1) 除了拳击，我喜欢所有的运动。(2) 他被取消了拳击比赛资格。

translation: vt.抵制（贸易）；拒绝参加
examples: (1) He urged all citizens to boycott Korean goods.(2) We boycott all products tested on animals.(3) We boycott some country because it hurts our ego.(4) We are determined to boycott them.(5) The union called on its members to boycott the meeting.
(1) 他呼吁所有民众联手抵制韩国货。(2) 我们抵制用动物做产品实验。(3) 我们抵制某国货，因为他伤了我们的面子。(4) 我们决定拒绝跟他们来往。(5) 工会号召其会员拒绝参加会议。

translation: n.脑；智力；智者；控制中心vt.打 ... 的脑袋
examples: (1) The drug may cause permanent brain damage.(2) His brain seems to be functioning normally.(3) His brain was clouded by vapours and dreams.(4) She has a good brain.(5) You need brains to become a university professor.(6) He is one of the leading brains in the country.(7) Brain is the master control center of the body.(8) The medulla oblongata is the most vital part of the brain because it contains centers controlling breathing and heart functioning.(9) I'll brain you if you don't keep quiet.
(1) 这种药可能会引起永久性的脑部伤害。(2) 他的大脑看起来功能正常。(3) 他的脑子里充满空想和梦幻。(4) 她很有头脑。(5) 当大学教授要有才智。(6) 他是国家的知识分子精英。(7) 脑是身体的主要控制中心。(8) 延髓是大脑最重要的部分，因为它包含着呼吸和心脏功能的控制中心。(9) 如果你不保持安静的话，我就敲你的脑袋。

translation: n.制动器；闸；刹车v.刹车
examples: (1) There's too much travel on the brake, it needs tightening.(2) The brake doesn't grip properly.(3) A lot of the cost of maintenance go into renew brake.(4) The car in front of me stopped suddenly and I had to brake.(5) The driver braked his car suddenly.
(1) 制动器太松了，需要调紧。(2) 刹车不灵了。(3) 很多的维修费用都花在了更换煞车方面。(4) 我前面那辆小汽车突然停住，我只好刹车。(5) 司机突然煞车。

translation: n.分部；部门；分店；分支；树枝v.分岔；分支
examples: (1) Can we drop the car off at any of your branch?(2) Mr. Smith works in an executive branch of the government.(3) Send these orders down to our branch office.(4) Gynaecology is a branch of medicine.(5) The gardener cut off a branch from the tree.(6) The olive branch is the emblem of peace.(7) Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.(8) She's leaving the company to branch out on her own.
(1) 我们可以在你们的任何一家分公司还车吗？(2) 史密斯先生在政府的行政部门工作。(3) 把这些订货单发送到我们的分店。(4) 妇科学是医学的一个分科。(5) 园丁从树上砍下一根树枝。(6) 橄榄枝是和平的象征。(7) 顺着这条大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。(8) 她打算脱离这家公司，自己开业。

translation: n.烙印；商标；牌子；标记vt.加污名于；铭记；打烙印
examples: (1) As an author who was in a period when the new and the old interlaced, Cervantes had a brand of two ages inevitably.(2) You may personalize the design to match your company's existing brand identity and design specifications.(3) The advertising manager may set as a goal for advertising an increase of 15 percent in consumer brand awareness in the next six months.(4) She's gone over to a milder brand of cigarettes.(5) He has his own brand of humor.(6) The ceiling is pasted with labels of liquor brand .(7) Those who have triumphantly withstood such strains may brand his name.(8) It's unfair to brand all football fans as troublemakers.(9) Cowboys round up their cattle in the spring time to brand the new calves.

(1) 作为新旧两个时代交替期的作家,塞万提斯身上不可避免地带有两个时代的烙印。(2) 您也可以进行个性化设计,使其符合公司的现有商标与设计规范。(3) 广告经理确定的目标为:在今后的6个月里，通过广告，提高消费者商标知晓率的15%25。(4) 她已改吸另一牌子味道较淡的香烟。(5) 他有他独特的幽默感。(6) 天花板上贴了许多酒类商标。(7) 那些成功地经受了严峻考验的人们或许会污辱他的名声。(8) 把所有的球迷都当成闹事者是不公平的。(9) 牛仔们在春天时把牛赶拢在一起，给新生下来的看犊打上印记。

translation: adj.勇敢的；英勇的v.勇敢地面对
examples: (1) The soldier's brave deeds brought him honor and glory.(2) Let us remember the brave who died for the peace of the world.(3) They made a brave stand against the enemy.
(1) 士兵的勇敢事迹为他带来了荣耀和赞美。(2) 让我们永远怀念为世界和平献身的勇士们。(3) 他们对敌人进行了英勇的抵抗。

translation: n.勇敢；华丽(的衣服)
examples: (1) Several soldiers were decorated for bravery.(2) His bravery should be an example to all of us.(3) He was awarded a merit badge for his bravery in the battle.(4) They visited all the braveries of the city.(5) She came to the party in all the bravery of her new dress.
(1) 数名士兵因英勇而受嘉奖。(2) 他的勇敢应作为我们大家学习的榜样。(3) 他因为在战斗中的勇猛被授予一枚奖章。(4) 他们参观了城里的所有美景。(5) 她穿着一身鲜艳的新衣前来参加聚会。

translation: n.突破，突破性进展；关键问题的解决
examples: (1) It is a major technological breakthrough.(2) He finally has a breakthrough in his creation.(3) The scientists strive for a breakthrough in cancer research.(4) The medical breakthrough proves that guzzling ale is not the only reason why men develop saggy stomachs.
(1) 这是一次重要的技术突破。(2) 他终于在创作上有了突破。(3) 科学家们力争在癌症研究方面有个突破。(4) 医学上的这一突破表明，男人们的啤酒肚并不完全是因为狂饮啤酒而造成的。

translation: n.乳房；胸脯vt.(以胸)对着
examples: (1) The little baby can take nourishment from the breast.(2) The baby was being nursed at its mother's breast.(3) The bird's breast is flecked with brown.(4) They had chicken breast for supper.(5) His head sank forward on his breast.(6) Who is the first to breast the tape?
(1) 小婴儿可以从乳房中吸取营养。(2) 那个孩子正在吃母亲的奶。(3) 这只鸟胸前有棕色斑点。(4) 他们晚饭吃鸡胸肉。(5) 他的头垂向胸前。(6) 谁第一个到终点的?

translation: n.呼吸；气息
examples: (1) He caught his breath in surprise.(2) His chest heaves with every breath.(3) It took us a few minutes to get our breath back after the race.(4) His breath smelt suspiciously of drink.(5) The delicious breath of rain was in the air.
(1) 他惊奇得屏住了呼吸。(2) 他的胸部随着呼吸而起伏。(3) 赛跑后我们用了好几分钟才恢复了正常呼吸。(4) 他嘴里呼出的气息好象有酒味。(5) 空中弥漫着清新的雨的气息。

translation: adj.喘不过气来的
examples: (1) Bob was breathless with excitement.(2) I was completely breathless when I got to the top of the mountain.(3) The children are breathless as they watch the tightrope act.
(1) Bob激动得喘不过气来.(2) 当我到达山顶上时，我已经上气不接下气了。(3) 孩子们在看走绳索表演时呼吸都屏住了。

translation: n.啤酒厂
examples: (1) Workers at the Tsingtao Brewery bottle beer for export.(2) He worked in a brewery, loading the bottles into wooden crates.
(1) 青岛啤酒厂的工人为出口的啤酒装瓶。(2) 他在一个啤酒厂工作，把瓶子装进木箱里。

translation: n.砖；砖块；砖状物vt.用砖围砌（或堵）
examples: (1) His new house was built by himself, brick by brick.(2) Her husband is a brick layer.(3) He had a brick thrown at him at that meeting.(4) He bought a brick of cheese and a bottle of wine.(5) All the windows were bricked up.
(1) 他的新房子是他自己一块砖一块砖砌起来的。(2) 她丈夫是个砌砖匠。(3) 那次集会时，他的头部被一块砖头击中。(4) 他买了一块乳酪和一瓶葡萄酒。(5) 所有的窗户都用砖堵住了。

translation: n.新娘
examples: (1) The bride wore a beautiful white dress.(2) We must drink to the health of the bride.(3) The bride brought many dowries to her husband.(4) The bride was given away by her father.(5) I suppose we shall be having some sort of celebration for the bride.
(1) 新娘穿了一身美丽的白色礼服。(2) 我们要为新娘的健康干杯。(3) 新娘带着很多嫁妆给她丈夫。(4) 由父亲把新娘交与新郎。(5) 我想我们还是来为新娘庆贺一番吧。

translation: n.新郎
examples: (1) The bridegroom was dressed in a grey suit.(2) Bride and bridegroom start from Mohandseen.
(1) 新郎穿一套灰色礼服。(2) 新郎和新娘一起从婚纱影楼出发。

translation: adj.短暂的；短期的；简短的；扼要的n.摘要；案件陈述vt.作…的概述；（向…）简单介绍
examples: (1) There was a brief pause in the conversation.(2) We have a tight schedule for your brief visit. I hope you don't mind.(3) In the beginning, the teacher gave us a brief introduction about the subject.(4) I don't want to keep you long, so let me be brief.(5) He drew up a brief for his speech.(6) The lawyers declared on a court brief that they will argue Mr. Brown's innocence by reason of insanity.(7) The chairman will brief the Board on the most recent developments.
(1) 对话中有短暂的停顿。(2) 对您短暂的访问,我们为您安排的日程很紧,希望您不介意。(3) 开始时,老师给我们做了关于这门课程的简短介绍。(4) 我不想浪费大家的时间,就简明扼要地讲几句吧。(5) 他起草了一份讲话的摘要。(6) 律师们在呈交法庭的辩护状上声明,他们将以神经错乱为由为布朗先生作无罪辩护。(7) 主席将向董事会概述最近的发展。

translation: adj.卓越的；灿烂的；美妙的；杰出的；才华横溢的n.宝石
examples: (1) He has got brilliant achievements in the field of physics.(2) The brilliant sun lit up their rooms.(3) The novel is considered a brilliant performance.(4) She's brilliant but self-effacing.
(1) 他在物理学方面已经取得了卓越的成就。(2) 灿烂的阳光照亮了他们的屋子。(3) 这部小说被认为是出色的佳作。(4) 她才华横溢而不露锋芒。

translation: adj.宽广的；清楚无误的；明显的；胸怀开阔的；粗俗的n.女子
examples: (1) The broad steps in front of the mansion made it look very dignified.(2) The Minister gave a broad hint that she intends to raise taxes.(3) The kidnapping occurred in broad daylight.(4) He is broad-minded.
(1) 宽阔的台阶使大厦的正面显得很气派。(2) 首相明白地暗示她打算提高税额.(3) 在光天化日之下竟发生绑架事件。(4) 他是一个心胸宽阔的人。

translation: v.广播；散布；撒播n.广播；广播节目
examples: (1) The chairman's speech will be broadcast nationwide.(2) She broadcasts on current affairs.(3) The BBC broadcasts all over the world.(4) Before this play is broadcast several cuts must be made.(5) You don't have to broadcast my news to the whole world!(6) Broadcast of seeds is done by hand.(7) The broadcast was recorded, not live.(8) Here is a political party broadcast before an election.
(1) 主席的讲话将向全国广播。(2) 她发表时事广播演说。(3) 英国广播公司向全世界播送节目。(4) 这个剧目播出前必须经过数次剪辑。(5) 你不能把我的事告知全天下。(6) 用手撒播种子。(7) 这次广播是事先录音的，不是现场直播。(8) 这是某党派选举前的政治广播节目。

translation: n.手足情谊；兄弟关系；同业会
examples: (1) Soldiers who are fighting together often have a strong feeling of brotherhood.(2) I value the brotherhood between us.(3) He believes in the brotherhood of all peoples.
(1) 一起作战的士兵相互间常怀有深厚的兄弟情谊。(2) 我珍视我们之间兄弟般的情谊。(3) 他相信各民族间都应亲如兄弟。

translation: n.早午餐
examples: (1) Brunch is a cross between breakfast and lunch.(2) They eat much the same thing for brunch every day.
(1) 早午餐是介于早餐兴午餐的中间餐。(2) 每天早午餐他们总是吃同样的东西。

translation: n.【C】水桶；（机器上的）桶装物；大量vi.颠簸行进；下倾盆大雨vt.装在桶里
examples: (1) Go and fill this bucket with water for me.(2) He came down the hill carrying a bucket of water.(3) I knocked over the bucket and the water poured (out) all over the floor.(4) They buy tickets by the bucket and sell them at a profit.(5) The old car bucketed along at about thirty.(6) The rain bucketed down.(7) The girl was bucketing water from the well.
(1) 去替我装满一桶水来。(2) 他提著一桶水下山来了。(3) 我打翻了水桶，水流了一地。(4) 他们买了很多票,并且再卖掉以获取利润。(5) 那辆旧车以30公里左右的时速行驶。(6) 大雨倾盆。(7) 那姑娘在用桶从井里打水。

translation: n.佛教
examples: (1) Some young people study Zen Buddhism or Bahai.(2) Mr White has converted to Buddhism.
(1) 有些年轻人研究禅宗佛教或伊斯兰巴哈教派的教义。(2) 怀特先生已改信佛教。

translation: adj.佛教的n.佛教徒
examples: (1) He's fascinated with Buddhist ceremonies.(2) Buddhist practice and faith involves finding inner peace and calm.(3) The old Buddhist wouldn't harm a fly.(4) How do we become a devout Buddhist?
(1) 他迷上了佛教的仪式。(2) 佛教的修行和信仰包括追求的是内心的平静。(3) 那个老佛教徒不愿意伤害一只苍蝇。(4) 要如何成为虔诚的佛教徒？

translation: n.预算vt.编预算；为 ... 做预算vi.节省开支adj.廉价的；不贵的
examples: (1) Congress has approved the new educational budget.(2) Our budget needs drastic revision.(3) The government has budgeted 10000000 pounds for education spending.(4) The government plans to budget a new hospital.(5) If we budget carefully, we'll be able to afford a new house.(6) You can buy high-quality goods at budget prices there.
(1) 国会通过了新的教育预算。(2) 我们的预算需作重大修改。(3) 政府将10000000英镑编入教育预算。(4) 政府计划在预算中拨款建一家新医院。(5) 如果我们精打细算就能买一座新房子了。(6) 你可以在那买到物美价廉的商品。

translation: n.自助餐；饮食柜台；打击vt.连续猛击；打击
examples: (1) We serve buffet during lunchtime only.(2) We had a buffet supper last evening.(3) In the corner of the room there was a small buffet.(4) There was a caterers' buffet stretching all around the dining room.(5) All life's buffet shall be met with dignity and good sense.(6) Strong winds buffet the ship from time to time.(7) The ship buffeted through the big waves.(8) Flowers are buffeted by the rain and wind.
(1) 我们只在午餐时间供应自助餐。(2) 昨天晚上，我们吃了一次自助晚餐。(3) 在屋子角落里有一小的餐具柜。(4) 餐厅周围有一排饮食承办者的冷餐台。(5) 所有人生之打击都应以尊严和理智对付之。(6) 狂风时不时地击打着航船。(7) 这艘船在波涛中奋勇前进。(8) 花朵受风吹和雨打。

translation: n.小面包；圆发髻n.酒醉
examples: (1) He stole a bun from the shop.(2) There are some currants in this bun.(3) He put a fillet steak in the bun.(4) I bought some buns for tomorrow's breakfast.(5) She wears her hair in a bun.
(1) 他从店里偷了一个圆面包。(2) 这个圆面包里有些葡萄干。(3) 他把一片无骨牛排放进小圆面包里。(4) 我买了几个圆面包当明天的早餐。(5) 她把头发盘成一个髻。

translation: n.串；束；一群；捆n.突出物；凸起vt.使成一束(或一群等)vi.隆起；成束成群
examples: (1) I bought a bunch of grapes.(2) He gave a bunch of flowers to his girlfriend.(3) He goes round with a bunch of thugs.(4) Be sure not to bunch the flowers up tightly.(5) Don't bunch up all the candlesticks in one corner of the shelf.(6) His arm muscles bunch out when he lift the stone lion.(7) Spread out more. Don't bunch up on the centre.
(1) 我买了一串葡萄。(2) 他送给女友一束花。(3) 他经常和一帮流氓厮混。(4) 务必不要把花束捆得太紧。(5) 不要把蜡烛台全部捆在一起放在架子的一个角上。(6) 他举起石狮时臂上的肌肉一块一块隆起。(7) 再散开一点，不要都挤在中间。

translation: n.(有凉台的)平房；小屋
examples: (1) In the preserved old urban bungalow area, clean energy will be used for heating.(2) His gaze goes back to the bungalow.(3) You can trade from a beach bungalow or a mountaintop chalet, as long as you have a good Internet connection.
(1) 市区平房保留区采暖设施改用清洁能源。(2) 他再次盯住了那间小屋。(3) 只要你有互联网连接，你可以在海边小屋交易，或在山顶木屋交易。

translation: n.负担；责任；装载量；主题；[音乐]副歌v.使负重；装载；烦扰
examples: (1) The burden on his back seemed to be crushing him to the earth.(2) People on high incomes face a huge tax burden.(3) The burden of organizing the campaign fell to me.(4) I don't want to lay a burden on you.(5) The burden of his argument was that life is precious.(6) I don't want to burden you with my problem.
(1) 他背上的重负似乎要把他压倒在地。(2) 高收入的人面临着沉重的纳税负担。(3) 组织这次活动的责任落到了我头上。(4) 我不想让你承担责任。(5) 他论证的要点是生命是宝贵的。(6) 我不想让我的问题给你添麻烦。

translation: adj.官僚的；繁文缛节的
examples: (1) In this manner the reformists who have outlived their own day work for the fascists along bureaucratic lines.
(1) 这样，这班早该死去的改良主义者们就沿着官僚的路线为法西斯服务了。

translation: n.窃贼
examples: (1) The governor pardoned the burglar.(2) Did a burglar break into your house last night?
(1) 州长赦免了那个窃贼。(2) 昨晚有个窃贼闯进你家吗？

translation: n.埋葬；葬礼；坟墓
examples: (1) His body was brought back to England for burial.(2) The burial will be on Wednesday.(3) He was given an honorable burial.(4) The body was placed in bier before burial.(5) Heaven gives life and earth provides the burial place.(6) In the opening verse we find the women coming to the tomb to anoint the body for burial.
(1) 他的遗体已运回英国埋葬。(2) 遗体将在周三被埋葬。(3) 他的葬礼很体面。(4) 在举行葬礼以前尸体被放在棺材里。(5) 天赐生命，地供坟墓。(6) 在本章一开始的经节中，我们看到一些妇女来到坟墓前，为埋葬耶稣用油膏耶稣的身体。

translation: v.燃烧；烧着；烧毁；灼伤；急于n.烧伤；燃烧
examples: (1) Half the candle had burnt away.(2) It's better to burn out than to fade away!(3) If the satellite returns to earth too fast, it will burn up on the way.(4) He is going to scalp me or burn me at the stake.(5) She is burning to tell you the news.(6) Tell him to put cold water on the burn.(7) He died of the burns he received in the fire.(8) It seems that matter is lost when fuels burn.(9) Coal of this quality doesn't burn very easily.
(1) 蜡烛已烧去一半。(2) 与其慢慢凋谢,不如灿烂燃烧!(3) 如果人造卫星返回地球太快,它在归途中就会烧毁了。(4) 他要剥掉我的头皮或是在火刑柱上烧我。(5) 她急于要告诉你这消息。(6) 告诉他,在烧伤处敷凉水。(7) 他因在火灾中受烧伤而死。(8) 似乎燃料燃烧时物质就消失了。(9) 这种品质的煤不容易燃烧。

translation: n.爆发；破裂；阵v.爆裂；迸发；冲；闯
examples: (1) There was a burst of laughter in the next room.(2) The pipe burst and a spout of water shoot out.(3) Prices went up and up in recent years, before the housing bubble burst.(4) I've eaten so much I'm bursting at the seams.(5) The boy blew the paper bag out and burst it.(6) I felt as if my heart would burst with joy.(7) And then in one climactic burst of sound they surged forward.(8) The police burst through the door.
(1) 隔壁房间里突然爆发出一阵笑声。(2) 水管破裂了，一股水喷了出来。(3) 最近几年价格持续上涨，直到房价泡沫的破裂。(4) 我吃得太多了，肚子都要撑破了。(5) 那男孩把纸袋吹胀后又把它弄破了。(6) 我觉得自己高兴得心花怒放。(7) 突然间纵声大呼，疾冲而出。(8) 警察破门而入。

translation: vt.埋葬；隐匿；专心致志；抛弃
examples: (1) Even if you kill me, even if you bury me, I should rise again.(2) The funeral is tomorrow and they will bury the body after the church service.(3) He likes to bury himself in the country.(4) She had learnt to bury her feelings.(5) You will have to bury yourself in your studies if you want to pass the exam.(6) He was sitting with his head buried in a book.(7) Just bury the hatchet and go have a drink together!
(1) 即使你杀了我(2) 葬礼明天举行，他们会在教堂仪式后埋葬遗体。(3) 他喜欢隐居乡间。(4) 她已经学会了感情不外露。(5) 如果你想通过考试，就得专心致志地学习。(6) 他坐着埋头看书。(7) 别吵了，一起去喝一杯吧！

translation: 公共汽车站
examples: (1) She is likely to be waiting us at the bus stop.(2) Excuse me, is there a bus stop near by?(3) Anybody will tell you where the bus stop is.(4) I met him at the bus stop.
(1) 她可能已在车站等着呢。(2) 打扰了，请问附近有公共汽车站吗？(3) 谁都能告诉你公共汽车站在哪。(4) 我在公共汽车站遇到他的。

translation: n.灌木丛；矮树v.丛生；(以灌木)标记、保护、支撑Bush.n.布什(姓氏)
examples: (1) He scrabbled about in the bush for the ball.(2) The rabbit started from the bush.(3) There is some ice in the bush.(4) With a few quick snips of the shears he pruned the bush.(5) The soldier saw a gun jutting out from a bush.(6) I can't pull this bush up, it's firmly rooted in the ground.(7) There are many anecdotes about George Bush.(8) If you cut off some of the branches,the tree would not bush out.(9) They have gone ahead to bush out a safe way across the frozen lake.
(1) 他在灌木丛中爬着到处找球。(2) 野兔从灌木丛中突然窜了出来。(3) 树丛里有些冰。(4) 他用大剪刀几下子就把灌木给修剪好了。(5) 那士兵看见一支枪从矮树丛伸出来。(6) 这棵矮树我拔不起来。它的根在地里生得很牢。(7) 有很多关于布什的有趣的故事。(8) 如果你砍掉一些树枝的话，这棵树就不会枝杈丛生。(9) 他们已到前面去了，在冰封的湖面上用树枝标出一条安全通道。

translation: n.女商人
examples: (1) A businesswoman created a special shelter to house injured animals.(2) A Chinese businesswoman became very rich recycling waste paper.
(1) 一个女商人找到了一所房子饲养这些狗。(2) 一名中国的女商人靠循环利用废纸发了财。

translation: n.屠夫；刽子手；肉商；小贩vt.屠宰；滥杀；将某事弄得一团糟
examples: (1) The butcher chopped off a rib of frozen pork.(2) Hitler was as a great a butcher as the world has seen.(3) The butcher will dress the chicken for you.(4) The butcher's shop stank in hot weather.(5) Many western countries raise and butcher a large number of beef cattle.(6) They butchered the war prisoners.(7) Don't butcher that song by singing off key.
(1) 屠夫砍下一块冻肉的肋条。(2) 希特勒是有史以来最大的侩子手。(3) 肉商将为你准备加工好的鸡。(4) 肉铺热天散发出腥臭味。(5) 许多西方国家饲养并屠宰大量的肉牛。(6) 他们残杀战俘。(7) 别唱走调而糟蹋了那首歌。

translation: n.蝴蝶；蝶状物；蝶泳vt.(烹饪时把鱼肉等）切开摊平
examples: (1) A butterfly must not be confused with a moth.(2) A caterpillar is the larva of a butterfly.(3) A butterfly is flying up and down among the flowers.(4) What are the elements of the butterfly stroke?(5) Turn the fish over and butterfly it, before you put it in the oven.
(1) 不得将蝴蝶和飞蛾混同起来。(2) 毛虫是蝴蝶的幼体。(3) 有一只蝴蝶正在花丛里忽上忽下地飞着。(4) 蝶泳的泳姿动作要领是什么?(5) 把鱼翻过来，切开、摊平，然后放到炉子上。

translation: n.划船比赛
examples: (1) They are training for the boat race.(2) Simon rowed a boat race and got first place.
(1) 他们正在为划船比赛接受训练。(2) 西蒙参加了划船比赛并赢得了冠军。

translation: n. 婴儿，婴孩；孩子气的人vt. 纵容，娇纵；把……当婴儿般对待adj. 婴儿的；幼小的n. (Baby)人名；(法、葡)巴比；(英)巴比，芭比(女名)；(俄)巴贝
examples: She gave birth to a fine healthy baby.The mother rocked the baby to sleep in its cradle.We've turned the smallest bedroom into a nursery for our new baby.Baby, come on, let's go home, I'm tired.Don't be such a baby.Since 2001, organic baby food sales have jumped 63%.She has a baby car.Don't baby the boy.
她生了一个健康漂亮的婴儿。母亲摇动摇篮使婴儿入睡。我们已将最小的那间卧室改成新生婴儿的幼儿室。宝贝儿，快点儿，我们回家吧，我累了。别那么孩子气。从2001年以来,有机婴儿食品销售额已上升63%25。她有一辆微型汽车。别惯这孩子。

translation: n. 后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾vt. 支持；后退；背书；下赌注vi. 后退；背靠；倒退adv. 以前；向后地；来回地；上溯；回来；回原处adj. 后面的；过去的；拖欠的n. (Back)人名；(西、英、德、法、瑞典、捷)巴克
examples: Three people can sit in the back of this car.It encouraged him to talk because his back had stiffened in the night and it hurt truly now.You'll make your back ache if you carry those heavy buckets.John plays back in the team.I'll back you up no matter what's happening.I found no evidence to back your interpretation.You'll have to back the car up into the garage.He refused to back away from his position.Slacken your legs and slowly lie back.Stand back! You're stepping on my toes.The kangaroo uses its back legs to jump.I bought some back issues of science magazines yesterday.
这车的后座可坐3个人。他靠说话来鼓劲,因为他的背脊在夜里变得僵直,眼下真痛得厉害。如果你背那些沉重的桶，你的背会痛的。约翰在这个队打后卫。不论发生什么事,我都会支持你。我找不到证据来支持你的解释。你得倒车，开进车库。他拒绝放弃自己的立场。放松双腿, 慢慢向后躺下。向后站！你踩在我的脚趾头上了。袋鼠是用牠的后脚在跳。昨天我买了几本过期的科学杂志。

translation: adj. 坏的；严重的；劣质的n. 坏事；坏人adv. 很，非常；坏地；邪恶地n. (Bad)人名；(罗)巴德
examples: Smoking is bad for health.In the recession, our firm went through a bad time.He's gone to bad since he made friends with those people.Their travel plan was cancelled because of the bad weather.His shabby appearance creates a bad impression.It's a very bad thing to leave things around.Bad eyesight is less common in this part.A bad workman quarrels with his tool.I felt bad all day.She's got a bad headache.Leaving his name off the list was a bad slip-up.She has been racked with a bad cough.It's bad to you to read in the sun.Stagflation is bad for stock market valuations.In several passages he stressed that bad governments, especially corrupt or repressive ones, could not expect his help.Pogroms, crusades, bad Popes, and crooked preachers on the Old Time Gospel hour have left a bad taste in many people's mouths.I thought it was a very bad article.They protested about the bad food.The decadence of morals is bad for a nation.Your bad skin will tell against you if you want to be an actress.Bad breath, as well as being unpleasant, can be interpreted by would-be lovers as a sign of health problems.He was for putting bad men behind bars.The bad man will suffer eternal damnation.You must learn to take the bad with the good.That's what I want, and I want it bad.Alison sings bad.

吸烟对身体有害。我们公司在经济衰退时期历尽艰辛。他结交那些人后就开始堕落了。因为天气不好，他们的旅行计划取消了。他那寒酸的样子给人留下不好的印象。把东西到处乱扔是很不好的习惯。这地区很少有视力差的人。手艺差的工人总是抱怨工具不好使。我整天觉得不舒服。她头痛得厉害。名单上没有他的名字是个严重的疏忽。她一直为严重的咳嗽所苦。在阳光下读书是有害的。滞涨对股票价值是有害的。在几页文字中，奥巴马强调，管理不善的政府，特别是腐败的或是镇压性的政府是不可能获得他的帮助的。大屠杀，十字军东征，腐败的天主教皇，和一些歪曲事实的布道者在旧时期给人们留下了太多的负面影响。我以为那是一篇很低劣的文章。他们对低劣的伙食提出了抗议。道德的堕落对国家是不利的。如果你想当演员的话，你粗糙的皮肤对你是不利的。口气不清新或让人不舒服会被对方视为身体不健康的标志。他赞成将坏人关进监狱。坏人将会受到永远的惩罚。人必须学会好坏都能承受。这就是我想要的，而且是迫不及待要得到的。艾莉森唱得很糟。

translation: adv. 非常，很；严重地，厉害地；恶劣地
examples: The firm did badly last year.The child behaved badly at the party.He was wounded badly.She was injured badly in the accident.Traffic was badly snarled up near the accident.I never dreamt that he would behave so badly.She wants the doll badly.The bad news has shaken her up pretty badly.
公司去年生意不好。那孩子在聚会上的表现很差他伤得很厉害。她在这次意外中受到重伤。车祸现场附近交通极为混乱。我做梦都没想到他会表现得如此恶劣。她非常想要这个洋娃娃。那坏消息一直使她感到极度不安。

translation: n. 袋；猎获物；（俚）一瓶啤酒vt. 猎获；把…装入袋中；占据，私吞；使膨大vi. 松垂
