translation: prep. 在旁边；与…相比；和…无关
examples: I set a chair beside him and sat down.The little girl is sitting beside her mother.Our achievements seem small beside his.Money seems unimportant when setting beside the joys of family life.The discussion is beside the matter at hand.What you said may be right, but it is beside the question.
我在他旁边放了一把椅子然后坐下了。小女孩正坐在她妈妈旁边。与他的成就相比我们的就显得微不足道了。与天伦之乐相比,金钱显得微不足道。这种讨论与本题无关。你所说的也许是对的，但是与本题无关。

translation: n. 最好的人，最好的事物；最佳状态adj. 最好的adv. 最好地vt. 打败，胜过n. (Best)人名；(英、西、德、葡、法)贝斯特
examples: The facilities were not ideal but we managed as best we could.He's difficult at the best of times usually he's impossible.You had best not accept the offer.Take whatsoever measures you consider best.He would try to best his previous time.Any stigma will do to best a dogma.
设备不理想，但我们已经尽了最大的努力。他即使在情绪最好的时候，都很难相处－－平常就更令人受不了了。你最好是不要接纳这要求。采取任何你认为最好的措施。他竭尽全力去打破自己以前的纪录。一点漏洞，足可打破教条。

translation: n. 畅销书；畅销唱片
examples: He is writing a sequel to his latest best seller.Not all on the best?seller list are good.
他正在写他的最新畅销书的续集。不是所有的畅销书都是好书。

translation: n. 长辈；较好者；打赌的人（等于bettor）adv. 更好的；更多的；较大程度地adj. 较好的vt. 改善；胜过vi. 变得较好n. (Better)人名；(西、瑞典、德)贝特尔
examples: Her father transferred her to a better school.The union struck for better work conditions.You must pay extra for a better seat.You would write better if you had a good pen.You'll like it better when you understand it more.His solution of his debt enabled him to better his daily life.He had tried hard to better his status, but failed.We had hoped for better.
她父亲把她转到了一所更好的学校。工会为争取更好的工作条件而罢工。如要较好的座位必须另加钱。要是有枝好笔，就能写得更好。当你对它更了解时，你就会更喜欢它。他还清了债，可以过好点儿的日子了。他努力设法改善自己的地位,但未能成功。我们曾希望情况好转。

translation: prep. 在…之间adv. 在中间
examples: Children must attend school between 5 and 16.There is a generation gap between my parents and I.She tried to intervene between her husband and son.One town ends where the next begins and there's a road that runs between.
5至16岁的孩子必须上学。我父母和我之间有代沟。她想调解丈夫和儿子之间的争吵。一个城镇连接着另一个城镇,两者之间有一条路。

translation: adj. 大的；重要的；量大的adv. 大量地；顺利；夸大地n. (Big)人名；(土)比格
examples: New York is a big commercial city.His business yields big profits.Don't cry, you are a big boy now.The big moment has come at last!The big thing is that you know what you want.He's got a lot of big ideas about how to change the system.That rock and roll band is very big in Chicago.You need to think big(= aim to achieve a lot).As for us, we mustn't talk big in our external propaganda.The band comes over big with pop fans.With that new promotion he's now one of the bigs in the company.
纽约是一座大的商业城市。他的生意带来巨大的利润。别哭，你现在已经是大男孩了。重要的时刻终于到来了！重要的是你必须知道自己想要什么。就如何改变体制，他有一些远大的想法。那个摇滚乐团在芝加哥很受欢迎。你要敢想。在我们自己方面，对外宣传不要夸大。该乐队受流行音乐歌迷欢迎大为成功。通过那次得晋升，他现在是公司的杰出员工之一。

translation: n. 自行车；脚踏车vi. 骑自行车（或摩托车）n. (Bike)人名；(土、土库、塞)比克
examples: I've decided to buy that bike.The lost bike was discovered at the bus stop.John's parents vetoed his plan to buy a motor bike.This morning on my way to school, I saw a motorbike hit a man on a bike.Our boss loves to bike for an excursion.She did not dare to bike down the abrupt slope.
我已决定购买那辆自行车。丢了的脚踏车在公车站找到了。约翰的父母不同意他买摩托车。今天上班路上看到摩托车撞了一个骑车人。我们老板喜欢骑自行车去郊游。她不敢骑著自行车冲下陡峭的斜坡。

translation: n. [法] 法案；广告；账单；[金融] 票据；钞票；清单vt. 宣布；开账单；用海报宣传
examples: A 10% service charge is added on to the bill.I have a 5-dollar bill.A bill came along with the package.After a long debate the bill was passed.A bill of fare is very helpful to TV viewers.he used a bill to prune branches off of the tree.We'll bill you next week for your purchases.I can't pay for the books now. Will you bill me (for them) later?Please bill goods in the store.She is billed to appear as Jane.Bill Gates is an American citizen.
帐单上包括了百分之十的服务费。我有一张5美元的钞票。清单与包裹一并到达。经长时间的辩论，议案获得通过。节目单对电视观众来说非常有用。他用钩镰从树上剪除枝条。下周我们将把你购买的物品开账单给你。这些书我现在不能付款，事後给我寄帐单来好吗?请写出商店的商品目录。据海报说，她扮演简爱。比尔·盖茨是美国公民。

translation: n. 十亿；大量num. 十亿adj. 十亿的n. (Billion)人名；(法)比利翁
examples: It took them more than one billion dollars to complete the project.Some computers can perform over a billion computation a second.The human brain contains several billion nerve cells, which are connected with one another by fine nerves.
完成这个工程花费了他们十亿多美元。有些计算机一秒钟能完成超过十亿次运算。人类的大脑含有几十亿个神经细胞，这些细胞由纤细的神经将彼此连接起来。

translation: n. （一个地区全部的）生物；生物学
examples: He specializes biology.We have a biology lesson tomorrow.He is an environmentalist with a passion of the biology and geography of the region.He is knowledgeable about the biology of the honeybee.
他主修生物学。明天我们有堂生物学课。他是一个环保人士，对这个地区的生物和地理很有热情。他对蜜蜂的生活规律知之甚多。

translation: n. 鸟；家伙；羽毛球vt. 向…喝倒彩；起哄vi. 猎鸟；观察研究野鸟n. (Bird)人名；(英、西)伯德
examples: That bird tried to peck me.The penguin is a flightless bird.Better be a bird in the wood than one in the cage.The thrush is a kind of small singing bird.
那只鸟想啄我。企鹅是一种不会飞的鸟。宁为林中鸟,不作笼中禽。画眉是一种小鸣禽。

translation: n. 生日，诞辰；诞生的日子
examples: I received a set of gardening tools on my birthday.He gave her an expensive fur for her birthday.Tom's birthday is this week.Next Monday will be my 21st birthday.I was eighteen on my last birthday.
生日那天，我收到一套园艺工具。他送给她一件昂贵的毛皮衣服作为生日礼物。汤姆的生日就在这个星期。下星期一是我二十一岁的生日。我已经过了18周岁了。

translation: n. [计] 比特（二进位制信息单位）；少量；马嚼子；辅币；老一套；一点，一块vt. 控制adj. 很小的；微不足道的adv. 有点儿；相当vt. 咬（bite的过去式和过去分词）
examples: He only put a bit on his plate to make fashion.He assembled the model aircraft bit by bit.Let the broth simmer down a bit more.The horse was champing the bit .A power drill will chatter if the bit is loose.
他只是拨了一点食物到盘子里做做样子。他一块一块地装配飞机模型。让肉汤炖得再久一些吧。这匹马格格地咬着马嚼子。如果钻头松动，电钻会嘎嘎作响

translation: adj. 黑色的；黑人的；邪恶的n. 黑色；黑人；黑颜料vt. 使变黑；把鞋油等涂在…上；把（眼眶）打成青肿vi. 变黑n. (Black)人名；(英、西)布莱克；(德、葡、捷)布拉克
examples: Do you have a black jacket?How do you like coffee, black or white ?His hands were black from working on the car all afternoon.His father looked as black as thunder.The future looks pretty black.The black earthly spirit of the priests wounded my life.The sky looks black and threatening.The Pentagon's black budget are very highly classified.The black shows up against the white.He was the first black to be elected as Mayor.After her husband died, she dressed in deep black for the rest of her life.The unions have blacked all inports from country.He blacked his shoes before visiting his father-in-law.During the war we had to black out all our windows.

你有一件黑夹克吗？你喜欢什么样的咖啡?不加牛奶的还是加牛奶的?他的双手因为整个下午都在修车而变得脏黑黑的。他的父亲看上去极为愤怒。前景看来很暗淡。牧师邪恶的世俗灵魂伤害了我的心灵。天色阴沉可怕.五角大楼的机密预算是高度机密的。在白色的衬托下,黑色很显目。他是第一位被选为市长的黑人。她丈夫去世后，她终生都穿着黑色丧服。工会拒绝处理从这个国家进口的一切货物。在拜访岳父之前，他把鞋子擦黑。战时我们必须用黑布遮着窗口以免透光。

translation: n. 黑板
examples: Who's rubbed my figures off the blackboard?The blackboard is in the front of the classroom.Please raise your head and look at the blackboard.The teacher wrote on the blackboard with a piece of chalk.The teacher wrote down the new words on the blackboard.
谁把我写在黑板上的数字擦掉了?黑板在教室的前面。请抬起头来，看黑板。老师用一支粉笔在黑板上写字。老师在黑板上写出新单词。

translation: adj. 盲目的；瞎的adv. 盲目地；看不见地n. 掩饰，借口；百叶窗vt. 使失明；使失去理智n. (Blind)人名；(法)布兰；(德、瑞典)布林德
examples: Love is blind and sometimes deaf.She wants it so much that she became so stupid and blind.There's none so blind as those who won't see.Without his spectacles, he is as blind as a bat.She was blind to the silent worship in his eyes.The soldier was blinded in battle.Staring at an eclipse can blind you.Your pride cannot blind God!By this time Felice's tears began to blind her.Falling in love can blind us to an extent.Most parents have a blind spot for their children.Many elderly people give their money to crooks in blind faith.Something,such as a window shade or a Venetian blind,that hinders vision or shuts out light.The extract takes room air through the light shelf and lower window venetian blind cavity via the clerestory glazing plenum.

爱情是盲目的,有时甚至是聋的。她那么渴望,以致到了又笨又盲目的地步。瞎子不算瞎,有眼不看才是瞎。没有眼镜,他是几乎全盲的。她没有发觉他眼里流露出的无声的敬慕之情。那个士兵在战斗中双目失明。盯着日蚀看会致盲。你的骄傲蒙蔽不了上帝。这时候泪水开始蒙住了佛艾丽丝的眼睛。爱情会让人盲目。大多数父母盲目地疼爱他们的孩子。很多老人因盲目地相信骗子而把自己的钱给了他们。遮光物如窗帘或软百叶窗等能遮挡视线或挡住阳光的物体。这些汲取设备通过遮阳构架和较低的活动百叶窗间隙再经由天窗双层玻璃或的室内通风。

translation: n. 宽松的上衣；女装衬衫vt. 使…宽松下垂vi. 宽松下垂
examples: She wears a white blouse today.I am interested in your silk blouse.The secretary was wearing a blue chiffon blouse.
今天她穿了一件白色衬衫。我对你们的丝绸女衬衫感兴趣。这个秘书穿著一件蓝色的雪纺绸衬衫。

translation: n. 吹；打击；殴打vi. 风吹；喘气vt. 风吹n. (Blow)人名；(英)布洛
examples: The death of their daughter was a cruel blow.I was dazed by the blow on my head.Bill knocked him down with one blow.Now, Peter, make a wish and blow out the candles.It's blowing hard tonight.It is bad manners to blow your nose at table.A short circuit will blow the fuse.If you put on the iron, the fuse will blow out .I really blew the chances with Marilyn when I told her she looked fat in the dress she was wearing.
女儿的死对他们是一个残酷的打击。我的头挨了一击而觉得晕眩。比尔一拳把他打倒在地。彼得,现在你许个愿,然后吹蜡烛。今晚风大得很。吃饭时擤鼻子是不礼貌的行为。短路会烧断保险丝的。如果你插上电熨斗，则保险丝会断的。我真的把与玛罗琳的机会浪费了,刚才我告诉她她穿那条裙子显胖。

translation: n. 蓝色；[复数]（美国海、陆、空三军穿的）蓝色制服；蓝颜料；[the blue(s)][用作单数或复数]布鲁斯（歌曲）（一种伤感的美国黑人民歌adj. 蓝色的；沮丧的，忧郁的；下流的vt. 把…染成蓝色；使成蓝色；给…用上蓝剂；用上蓝剂于vi. 变成蓝色，呈蓝色n. （英、西、意）布卢（人名）
examples: She wore a dark blue coat.The pots are made with blue enamel.Someone has flown off with my blue bag.I'm feeling blue today.The thundery weather make me blue.Often, when it rains, Marty feels blue.It really is blue Monday after a wonderful weekend.His girl friend was blue about not being invited to the dance party yesterday.They were caught showing blue films in the theater and were arrested by the police.The color scheme of the room is blue and gold.On this chart, the erector is marked in blue.
她穿着一件深蓝色的上衣。这些锅上有蓝色的搪瓷。有人把我那蓝色的包偷拿走了。我今天的心情不好。雷雨欲来的天气让我忧郁。一下雨，玛琪就会变得忧郁。过了愉快的周末之后，星期一〔要上班〕实在是令人沮丧。他的女朋友昨天因未被邀请参加舞会而沮丧。他们在戏院放映色情电影被查到，并遭警方逮捕。这个房间的色彩配置是蓝色和金黄色。在这张图上竖立肌以蓝色标志。

translation: n. 小船；轮船vi. 划船
examples: They pushed the boat further into the water.Let's go boating on the lake.Are you going to America by boat or by plane?Don't miss the boat.They are training for the boat race.Simon rowed a boat race and got first place.This name comes from something shouted by crewmen on a boat.As the highway bridge has been damaged by the torrential flood, we have to boat it.
他们把小船又往水里推了推。我们去湖上划船吧。你到美国是坐船还是坐飞机？不要坐失良机。他们正在为划船比赛接受训练。西蒙参加了划船比赛并赢得了冠军。这个名字来自于船上的船员的喊叫。公路桥被汹涌的洪水冲垮了,我们不得不乘船去。

translation: n. 划船adj. 划船的v. 划船（boat的ing形式）
examples: Let's go boating on the lake.Swimming and boating were quite popular in Shelley's day.
我们去湖上划船吧。在雪莱的时代游泳和划船运动非常流行。

translation: n. 身体；主体；大量；团体；主要部分vt. 赋以形体n. (Body)人名；(英、法、罗)博迪
examples: A balanced diet provides nutrition for your body.Alcoholic drink can have a bad effect on your body.He is not mentioned in the main body of the text.The only part you need to read carefully is the body of your contract.The audience sat in the body of the hall.The police found a body at the bottom of the lake.The body was cold and showed no signs of life.He chiselled the body in and became a member of it.Imagination bodies forth the forms of things unknown.
均衡的食物使你的身体获得营养。含酒精的饮料会对你身体有很坏的影响。文章的主体中没有提到他。你只需仔细阅读合同的正文部分。观众坐在大厅中间。警方在湖底发现了一具尸体。那躯体冰凉，显现不出有生命的迹象。他钻进了这个团体，并成了它的成员。想象让这些未知事物形状具体。

translation: 健身；健美运动
examples: The process of developing the musculature of the body through specific types of diet and physical exercise,such as weightlifting,especially for competitive exhibition.
健美运动通过特殊饮食和锻炼，如举重，使肌肉发达的过程，尤指为了竞赛性的展示。

translation: n. 书籍；卷；账簿；名册；工作簿vt. 预订；登记n. (Book)人名；(中)卜(广东话·威妥玛)；(朝)北；(英)布克；(瑞典)博克
examples: That student lost his book yesterday.Write the essay in your (exercise-)books, not on rough paper.I'll book you on a direct flight to London.You'll have to book early if you want to see that fashion show.He was booked on a charge of speeding.He was booked by the referee for foul play.
那个学生昨天丢了书。把文章写在练习簿里，不要写在草稿纸上。我将为你预订直飞伦敦的航班。你要想看那场时装表演的话，就得早点儿定座位。他因超速开车而被记录在案。他因为动作犯规而被裁判记下姓名。

translation: n. 书签（等于bookmarker）；标记
examples: I put a beautiful bookmark into his book.She had marked her place with a bookmark.I created a bookmark for my favourite website.
我把一张漂亮的书签放入了他的书里。她把书签夹在读到的地方。我为自己最喜欢的网址创建了一个书签。

translation: n. 书店
examples: You can get this book at any bookshop.I saw him strike into a bookshop along the road.
在任何书店都买得到这本书。我看见他突然拐进路旁一家书店里去了。

translation: vt. 引导；踢；解雇；使穿靴n. 靴子；踢；汽车行李箱n. (Boot)人名；(英)布特；(德)博特
examples: My foot won't go into this boot.Italy vaguely resembles a boot.The door wouldn't open so I gave it a boot.The thief gave me a boot in my stomach.If you are late once more, you'll getting the boot.He got the boot after fourteen years and had to find a new job.I'll put the luggage in the boot.He squeezed six big bags into the boot of my car.He kept booting the ball into the crowd.His father booted him out of the house.It'll take my computer a couple of minutes to boot.
我的脚伸不进这只靴子。意大利国的形状像只靴子。门开不了,所以我朝门猛踢一脚。小偷朝我腹部踢了一脚。你再迟到一次,就要把你解雇了。他工作了14年后竟然被解雇了，只好另谋职业。我去把行李放进行李箱里。他把六个大提包硬塞进了我车子的行李箱。他总把球往人群中踢。他父亲把他从家里赶了出去。我电脑重启需要几分钟的时间。

translation: adj. 无聊的；令人厌烦的n. 钻孔v. 钻孔；使厌烦；挖空（bore的ing形式）n. (Boring)人名；(英、瑞典)博林
examples: It is awfully boring.It is boring to listen to the same story.His long boring story made me yawn.He gave a boring speech full of stale jokes.
太叫人厌烦了。听相同的故事是令人厌烦的。他的冗长的故事听得我直打呵欠。他的发言很乏味,满是陈腐的笑话。

translation: v. 出世（bear的过去分词）adj. 天生的n. (Born)人名；(柬)邦；(英、西、俄、捷、德、瑞典、匈)博恩
examples: The youngest is a born rider of the rails.Meg was born into a large family.I've never heard such nonsense in all my born days!Natalie was born to be a dancer.
小儿子是天生的流浪儿。梅格出生在一个大家庭。我一生中从未听到过这种胡言乱语。娜塔莉天生就是一个舞者。

translation: vi. 借；借用；从其他语言中引入vt. 借；借用n. (Borrow)人名；(英)博罗
examples: He uses his house as security to borrow the money.May I borrow your roller skates?You can borrow this dictionary from the library.Handel borrowed music from other composers.It is not allowed to borrow freely from other writers.
他用房子作借钱的抵押。我可以借你的旱冰鞋吗？你可以从图书馆借到这本字典。韩德尔的作品借鉴了其他作曲家的乐曲.肆意抄袭其他作者的作品是不允许的。

translation: adj. 两个的；两者的adv. 并；又；两者皆pron. 双方都；两者都conj. 既…且…n. (Both)人名；(德、罗、捷、南非、匈)博特
examples: Both his eyes are hurt.She kissed him on both cheeks.Both are good.Both of us knew it.He is both a soldier and a poet.A good manager is both competent and efficient.
他的两眼都受伤了。她吻了他的双颊。两者都好。我们两个都知道这件事。他既是个战士，又是个诗人。好的经理应当是称职而且有效。

translation: vt. 烦扰，打扰；使……不安；使……恼怒vi. 操心，麻烦；烦恼n. 麻烦；烦恼
examples: I've no time to bother with such things.Don't write anything that will bother the censor.It bothers me that he can be so insensitive.The problem has been bothering me for weeks.Don't bother about such trifles.He could produce excellent work but usually he can't be bothered.Don't bother yourself about me，I am doing quite well.He didn't even bother to say thank you.Oh,would you mind? I hate to be a bother.We're having a spot of bother with the new machine.I am afraid it was a bother for you to do this.I like cooking, I do it without any bother.It is no bother to me. And I'll be glad to do it.
我没时间为这种事烦恼。你可别写什么给检查员找麻烦的话。他这样麻木不仁，我心里很不痛快。那问题已经困扰了我几个星期。这丁点儿事不必放在心上。他其实可以把工作做好，可他往往嫌费事而不干。别为我操心,我一切都好。他甚至连说一声谢谢都不肯。哦，你不介意吗?我不愿麻烦别人。我们的新机器有一点小毛病。恐怕做这件事太麻烦你了。我喜欢做饭，一点儿也不嫌麻烦。一点儿也不麻烦,我很乐意做的。

translation: n. 瓶子；一瓶的容量vt. 控制；把…装入瓶中vi. （街头艺人演出后）收拢钱币
examples: Why don't we crack open a bottle of champagne to celebrate?Try not to bottle up your emotions.Tell us what's worrying you; don't bottle it up!Do you bottle your fruit or freeze it?
我们何不开瓶香槟酒庆祝一下呢？尽量不要压抑自己的情感。把心中的烦恼告诉我们,不要把它闷在心里！你是把水果装在罐里保存呢，还是冷冻起来保存？

translation: n. 碗；木球；大酒杯vi. 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动vt. 投球；旋转；平稳快速移动
examples: I have a bowl of cereal every morning.His grandfather gave her an earthenware bowl.Hollywood Bowl, the huge outdoor amphitheater, is very attractive.If we win, we'll have a bowl game this season.Capitol Hill lawmakers are pressing college football officials to switch the Bowl Championship Series to a playoff system.Jerry and Marcy begin to bowl.Botham came on to bowl after lunch.My parents like to bowl on Friday nights.
我每天早晨吃一碗麦片粥。他的祖父给了她一个陶碗。好莱坞圆形的露天剧场非常壮观。如果我们赢的话,我们就可以去打季后赛。国会山立法者给大学足球官员施加压力，让其将保龄球冠军系列赛转变为最后决赛制度。杰瑞和玛西开始打保龄球。午饭后博瑟姆开始投球。我父母喜欢在周五晚上玩保龄球。

translation: n. 箱，盒子；包厢；一拳vi. 拳击vt. 拳击；装…入盒中；打耳光n. (Box)人名；(英、法、西)博克斯
examples: He has eaten a whole box of chocolates.It's quite an effort to lift this heavy box.They have reserved a box for us in the theatre.The jurors filed into court one by one and took their places in the jury box.I gave him a good box on the ear.She gave him a box on his ears.Buy a Chinese little leaf Box decoration, a good tour souvenir, and happiness and luck are always with you.This spoon is made by box wood.This spoon is made by box wood.The oranges were boxed and sent off quickly.They were boxed up in a small shed during the flood.One of the runners got boxed in on the final bend.Paul will box his opponent tomorrow evening.I'll box your ears if you say that again.

他吃了一整盒巧克力。抬起这只沉重的箱子要花费相当大的力气。他们在剧院为我们预订了一个包厢。陪审员们鱼贯进入法庭，在陪审员席内就坐。我在他耳朵上狠打了一拳。她打了他一耳光。黄杨木雕像饰，旅游纪念佳品，购上一个，幸福吉祥。这个勺子是黄杨木做的。这个勺子是黄杨木做的。橘子被装入箱中，然后很快便运走了。洪水泛滥时他们被困在一间小棚里。一个赛跑者在转最后一弯时被人挡住了。明晚保罗将和他的对手进行拳击比赛。如果你再说那样的话，我就打你的耳光。

translation: n. 男孩；男人n. (Boy)人名；(英、德、西、意、刚(金)、印尼、瑞典)博伊；(法)布瓦
examples: That boy is about ten years old.The stone just missed the boy.Don't cry, you are a big boy now.She is partial to her youngest boy.That young boy of hers is quite a handful.The bell boy will take you to your room.
那个男孩大约有十岁。那块石头差点儿砸到那个男孩。别哭，你现在已经是大男孩了。她偏爱她的小儿子。她的小儿子是一个很难管教的孩子。这位青年服务员会引您去您的房间。

translation: n. 面包；生计vt. 在…上洒面包屑
examples: They had nothing to eat but stale bread.I had a frugal meal of bread and cheese last night.Bread the pork chops before frying them.
除了陈面包外，他们没有别的东西可吃。我昨晚吃了只有面包和奶酪的便餐。炸猪排前先在上面撒一点面包碎屑。

translation: vi. 打破；折断；弄坏；削弱vt. （使）破；打破（纪录）；（常指好天气）突变；开始vi. （嗓音）突变；突破；破晓；（价格）突然下跌n. 破裂；间断；（持续一段时间的状况的）改变；间歇
examples: If you discover a fire, break the glass to sound the fire alarm.To frighten the dog, he broke a twig from the tree.What shocked the workers was that the boss had broken his promise.The spy had finally broken the code.One hates to break with an old friend.When she went to break the news to Harriet, however, Emma found her quite unperturbed by it.Their good cheer broke after repeated setbacks.Stock prices broke when the firm suddenly announced layoffs.The cold spell broke yesterday.A break in the pipe was found out.There is a break during the performance for the audience to take a rest.The audience certainly want the television programming without commercial breaks.The dog made a break toward the open field.He finally got the big break in life.

如果你发现了火灾,打碎玻璃去弄响火警铃报警。为了吓唬那只狗,他从树上折了一根小树枝。工人们感到震惊的是,老板竟然违背了诺言。那个间谍最终破译了密码。人都不喜欢跟老朋友绝交。可是,当爱玛委婉地把这个消息透露给哈里特时,却发现哈里特并没有因此感到不安。他们的热诚在接二连三的挫折之后消失殆尽当公司突然宣布裁员时，股票价格便大跌寒流昨天就结束了管道上有一处裂缝。演出中有一次中场休息，让听众们稍事休息。观众们当然想看没有插商业广告的电视节目。狗向田野冲去他一生中最后走了好运。

translation: n. 早餐；早饭vi. 吃早餐vt. 为…供应早餐
examples: We were having breakfast.He seldom eats breakfast.She juiced an orange for her breakfast.Mr. Smith left for London after breakfast.We breakfasted early.We will breakfast on cereal and toast.I am going to breakfast with them tomorrow.
我们正在吃早餐。他很少吃早餐。她用一只橙子榨汁作早餐饮料。史密斯先生吃过早餐后就动身去伦敦了。我们很早吃早餐。我们早餐吃谷物和吐司面包。明天我将与他们共进早餐。

translation: vi. 呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂vt. 呼吸；使喘息；流露；低声说
examples: Fish cannot breathe out of water.It is difficult to breathe at these altitudes.We breathe through the nasal passage.Promise me you won't breathe a word of this to anyone.His poems breathe sentimentality.His enthusiasm breathed new life into the company.
鱼离开水就不能呼吸。在这些高的地方很难呼吸。我们通过鼻腔呼吸。答应我别将此事泄漏给任何人。他的诗歌流露多愁善感的情调。他的热情给公司注入了新的生命。

translation: n. 桥；桥牌；桥接器；船桥vt. 架桥；渡过n. (Bridge)人名；(英)布里奇
examples: The bridge is not strong enough to allow the passage of vehicles.I think I'm lost; I can't find the bridge.They are a link to the past and a bridge to the future.The new bridge will link the Olympic Village with the rest of the Olympic Park.I have not the least idea about how to play bridge.Sometimes they played bridge together.She has bright eyes and high nose bridge.She wore spectacles over the bridge of her nose.They will bridge it over with planks.This helped to bridge over our difficulties.He did a lot to bridge over his difficulties .The decision is an attempt to bridge the distance between the rich and poor.The price gap is too wide to bridge.
这座桥不够牢固，车辆不能通行。我想我是迷路了，我找不到那座桥了。它们是联系过去的纽带，又是通向未来的桥梁。这座新桥将会成为连接奥运村和余下奥林匹克公园的纽带。我一点儿不知道怎样打桥牌。有时他们在一起打桥牌。她有一双明亮的眼睛和高高的鼻梁。她在鼻梁上架了副眼镜。他们将用木板在其上方架桥。这帮助我们渡过了困难。为渡难关他做了许多。这个决定旨在缩短贫富间的差距。价格差距太大，无法弥合。

translation: adj. 明亮的，鲜明的；聪明的；愉快的adv. 明亮地；光明地；欢快地n. 车头灯光n. (Bright)人名；(英)布赖特
examples: The bright moonlight showed the Taj Mahal in all its glory.He grew up in the country, but then found he preferred the bright lights.He is not bright, but he always works hard.The class are, in general, very bright.What a nice bright day!The guard blew his whistle,waved his bright green flag.Foresight tells us that China has a bright future.We must leave bright and early in the morning.You look better in bright colors like orange and red.I wore my caot,with golden lining,bright colours shining,worderful and new.
泰姬陵在明亮的月光下显得光彩夺目。他在乡村长大，但後来觉得很喜欢繁华的都市生活。他并不聪明，但工作总是勤勤恳恳。总的说来, 这个班级的学生都很聪明。今天天气多晴朗！卫兵吹起哨,舞动起鲜艳的绿旗。远瞻未来, 中国有着光明的前途。我们必须一大清早就离开。你穿亮色的衣服感觉更好看，比如橙色和红色就不错。穿上彩衣，镶金色毛带，神奇而鲜艳亮色有光彩。

translation: vt. 拿来；带来；促使；引起；使某人处于某种情况或境地n. (Bring)人名；(英、瑞典)布林
examples: She brought her boyfriend to the party.Rot it! I forgot to bring my book with me.Floods brought destruction to the vally.Smoke and flames brought the neighbors.He wondered what brought her to see him.Indigestion may bring about this disease.
她带着男朋友来参加聚会。糟了!忘记带书来了。洪水给山谷造了大灾害。浓烟和火焰引起了邻居们的注意他想知道是什么事使她想和他见面。消化不良可能引起这种病。

translation: n. 英国；不列颠
examples: Britain has always had a large navy, called the Royal Navy.In politics Britain has preferred evolution to revolution.The Chancellor of the Exchequer is the minister in charge of finance in Britain.Mr. Heath is the former Prime Minister of Britain.Britain was colonized by the Romans.Britain is a brief name of The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.The class are doing a project on the Roman occupation of Britain.The United Kingdom consists of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
英国一直有一支强大的海军，称为皇家海军。在政治上，英国喜欢渐进而不喜欢革命。英国财政大臣是负责财政的大臣。希思先生是英国前任首相。不列颠曾沦为罗马人的殖民地。不列颠是大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国的简称。这个班在进行一项关于古罗马人占领不列颠的研究。联合王国由大不列颠和北爱尔兰组成。

translation: adj. 英国的；英国人的；大不列颠的n. 英国人
examples: British manufacturing industry has been running down for years.The American Congress corresponds to the British Parliament.The British Isles lie in northwest Europe.The king laid British tribes under tribute.The British character is often said to be phlegmatic.I, dare say you are British but you still need a passport to prove it.The Americans spell some words differently from the British.He speaks British English.
英国的制造业多年来一直在走下坡路。美国的国会相当于英国的议会。不列颠群岛位于欧洲北部。国王强迫不列颠各部族向他进贡。英国人的性格常说成是冷漠的。我相信你是英国人，但仍需有护照加以证明。美国人拼写某些单词不同于英国人。他说英国英语。

translation: n. 手册，小册子n. (Brochure)人名；(法)布罗许尔
examples: I'll send you a brochure.The computer's features are detailed in our brochure.
我给你一份小册子。该计算机的特点在我们的小册子中有详细介绍。

translation: adj. 破碎的；坏掉的v. 折断；打碎；损坏（break的过去分词）
examples: He likes to tinker at broken gadgets.Can you glue the broken vase together?The broken windows have been boarded up.
他喜欢摸弄坏掉的小器具。你能把破碎的花瓶黏合起来吗?破碎的窗户已被木板封住。

translation: n. 扫帚；金雀花vt. 扫除vi. 桩顶开花或开裂n. (Broom)人名；(英)布鲁姆
examples: We use broom to sweep the floor.He picked up the broom to help me sweep the floor.He stopped sweeping and rested on the broom.The broom blooms when the bluebells bloom.The broom grows down the arid sand hill.He always had to broom the floor.She broomed up the scraps of paper.
我们用扫帚扫地。他拿起扫帚帮我扫地。他停止扫地，倚着扫帚休息。野风信子开花时金雀花也开花了。金雀草蔓延在干燥的沙丘下。他总是不得不打扫地板。她把纸屑扫在一起。

translation: n. 兄弟；同事；战友int. 我的老兄！n. (Brother)人名；(英)布拉泽
examples: John and Peter are brothers.The man who captained the home team is my brother.Don't be so unkind to your brother.I always confounded him with his twin brother.The Brethren hold a prayer meeting every Thursday.Moses was met on his arrival in Egypt by his elder brother, Aaron, and gained a hearing with his oppressed brethren.
约翰和彼得是兄弟。率领主队的是我的兄弟。别对你兄弟这么刻薄。我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。教友每周四举行一次祷告会。摩西在回到埃及的途中遇见了他的哥哥亚伦，也听到他受压迫的同胞们的诉求。

translation: adj. 棕色的，褐色的；太阳晒黑的vi. 变成褐色n. 褐色，棕色vt. 使变成褐色n. (Brown)人名；(英、意、芬、捷、德、法、西、葡)布朗
examples: He had brown skin.He bought a pair of dark brown shoes.Brown doesn't suit you.The leaves of various shades of brown are falling down.Heat the butter until it browns.This meat takes some time to brown properly when cooking.
他的皮肤是棕色的他买了一双深褐色的皮鞋。你不适合穿褐色衣服。各种深浅不同的棕色树叶正纷纷下落。把黄油加热，直到变成褐色为止。这种肉要花点时间才能煮成恰到好处的褐色。

translation: n. 刷子；画笔；毛笔；争吵；与某人有效冲突；灌木丛地带；矮树丛；狐狸尾巴vt. 刷；画；vi. 刷；擦过；掠过；（经过时）轻触
examples: He painted the wall with a brush.The painter swept a brush over his canvas.I'll give my coat a good brush.Let's burn off the rest of the brush.He had a brush with his neighbour.She  has a nasty brush with her boss this morning.We should brush our teeth at least twice a day.The light wind gently brushed her cheek.She is scouring the floor with a brush.I'll have to give my shoes a brush.He brushed the dust off his clothes.Don't bother to move.I think I can just brush past.A cat brushed against her leg in the darkness.
他用刷子涂墙。画家的画笔在画布上飞掠。我要把我的衣服好好刷一下。让我们把剩下的灌木丛清除掉。他和邻居发生了一点摩擦。今天早晨她跟老板大吵了一顿。我们每天应该至少刷两次牙。微风轻拂着她的脸颊。她正在用刷子擦地板。我必须把我的鞋擦一下。他掸掉衣服上的灰尘。不必麻烦动了,我想我能擦身挤过去。黑暗中,一只猫蹭着了她的腿。

translation: vt. 建立；建筑vi. 建筑；建造n. 构造；体形；体格
examples: That house is built of bricks.They planed to build a new laboratory.It is not an easy task to build a business.We should study hard to build a better future for ourselves.His analysis build up their confidence.We must build up a reserve fund to meet emergencies.She really did not have the build for a ballerina.That girl is of proportional build and is beautiful.
那座房子是砖造的。他们计划建造一个新的实验室。创业并不是一件容易的事情。我们应该努力学习,为自己创造更美好的未来。他的分析增强了他们的信心。我们必须逐渐积累一笔储蓄以备急需。她实际上并没有一个芭蕾舞女演员的体格。那少女身材匀称，长相漂亮。

translation: n. 建筑；建筑物v. 建筑；建立；增加（build的ing形式）
examples: The heat had blistered the paint of the building.The building faces north.The building does not conform to safety regulations.Houses and churches are buildings.The erection of the building took several months.The force of the explosion broke all the windows in the building.
酷热使建筑物上的油漆起了浮泡。这栋建筑物朝北。这座建筑物不符合安全条例。房子和教堂是建筑物。建造这座建筑物花了好几个月时间。爆炸的力量震碎了这座建筑上的所有窗户。

translation: n. 公共汽车乘公共汽车
examples: The busman stopped the bus.The bus driver asked the passengers to buy tickets.Nor can you always use bus interrupts.My bike to the bus station. Then I bus to work.
公共汽车司机停下了车。公共汽车司机要求乘客买票。你也不可能总是用总线中断。我骑自行车去汽车站,然后乘早班车去上班。

translation: n. 商业；[贸易] 生意；[贸易] 交易；事情
examples: He had no head for business.He was inexperienced in business.It's none of my business.I don't understand this business.They've done some business together.Business is always brisk before Christmas.
他毫无商业头脑。他在商业方面缺乏经验。这不关我的事。我不了解这件事。他们一起做过生意。圣诞节前生意总是很兴隆。

translation: n. 商人
examples: The businessman is a proverb for meanness.That businessman flies great distances every month.
那个商人因行为卑鄙而恶名远扬。那个商人每月都乘飞机来回很远的地方。

translation: adj. 忙碌的；热闹的；正被占用的vt. 使忙于n. (Busy)人名；(匈)布希；(法)比西
examples: He is busy with some important work.He was busy getting ready for his journey.The shop looked out into a busy street.The traffic was at its height at the busy junction.I tried to call Mr. Cooper, but the line was busy.To forget his trouble, he busied himself in his garden .As the final examinations draw near, students begin to busy themselves with reviewing.
他正忙于处理一些重要的事情。他正忙于准备旅行。这商店濒临近一条繁忙的街道。在繁忙的交叉路口，车辆来往正处于高峰。我想给库柏先生打个电话，但一直占线。为了把烦恼忘却，他让自己忙于花园的工作。当期末考试即将来临时，同学们开始忙于复习。

translation: conj. 但是；而是；然而adv. 仅仅，只prep. 除…以外n. (But)人名；(俄、罗)布特；(越)笔
examples: Our world is but a small part of the cosmos.He's still but a child.I want to say nothing but sorry.He can but admit that it was his fault.
我们的世界仅仅是宇宙的一小部分而已。他仅仅是个小孩子。我只想说对不起。他只得承认这是他的错误。

translation: vt. 涂黄油于；讨好n. 黄油；奶油；奉承话n. (Butter)人名；(英)巴特；(德、匈)布特
examples: inflict symbolicallyMy mother asked me to cream the butter and sugar together.She cooks omelets in butter as they do in France.She filmed a slice of bread with butter.I'll butter the bread.He began to butter up the director in hope of being given a better jobI've seen you buttering up the boss!
妈妈让我把黄油和糖搅成奶油状。她用奶油做法国式的蛋卷。她涂一层薄薄的奶油在一片面包上。我会给面包涂上黄油。他开始奉承主任，希望得到一份更好的工作。我看见你巴结老板来着！

translation: n. 按钮；纽扣vt. 扣住；扣紧；在…上装纽扣vi. 扣住；装有纽扣；扣上纽扣n. (Button)人名；(英)巴顿
examples: One of the buttons has come off my coat.You may stop the machine by pushing this button.It's very warm, he didn't even button his coat.
我上衣上的一颗扣子掉了。按下这个按钮你就可以关掉这个机器。天气很暖和,他甚至都没扣他外衣的钮扣。

translation: vt. 购买；获得；贿赂vi. 买，采购n. 购买，买卖；所购的物品n. (Buy)人名；(法)比伊
examples: Money can't buy happiness.I bought him a drink in return for his help.I'd like to buy a strong household bleach.Don't buy a used car from that rogue.They bought peace with their freedom.She tried to buy time by doing a lot of talk.It's nice to know that some people can't be bought.A lot of people just come into the shop without buying.It's a good buy at that price.That shirt was a really great buy.
金钱买不来幸福。我请他喝酒以酬谢他的帮助。我想买强力家用漂白剂。别从那无赖手里买旧车。他们牺牲自由换取和平。她企图以滔滔不绝的谈话来拖延时间。值得高兴的是有些人并不接受贿赂。有很多人进店但却不购物。这是一笔价钱合算的买卖。这个衬衫真是便宜货。

translation: prep. 通过；被；依据；经由；在附近；在……之前adv. 通过；经过；附近；[互联网] 白俄罗斯的国家代码顶级域名
examples: The house by the lake is a restaurant.He entered by the back door.The project was viewed favorably by the committee.He let himself down slowly by means of a rope.He hurried by and disappeared in the wood.I always keep a bottle of wine by in case friends call round.He lives near by.
湖边的那座房子是家饭店。他从后门进入。那计划受到该委员会的好评。他用一条绳子滑下来。他匆匆走过去，消失在森林里。我平时总存着一瓶酒以备朋友来时喝。他住在附近。

translation: int. 再见n. 轮空；次要的东西adj. 次要的n. (Bye)人名；(挪)比埃；(中)拜(广东话·威妥玛)；(英)拜伊；(瑞典)比耶
examples: Good bye, and take care!Look after yourself, Bye!Bye for now!
再见，多保重！自己当心点。再见！那就再见了！

translation: 属于
examples: The Chinese belong to the yellow race.I have every reason to be confident of our victory.
中国人属于黄种人。我有充分的理由坚信胜利是属于我们的。

translation: 自豪，高兴；以……而骄傲
examples: I confess to being proud of my son's success.He was proud of what he had done.
我自认以儿子的成功为荣。他因自己所作的事感到自豪。

translation: 对…严格
examples: One should be strict with oneself.The coach must be strict with the players.
一个人应对自己要求严格。教练一定要对球员严格要求。

translation: vt. 放弃；脱离……
examples: Can't you break away from old habits?He's broken away from his family.Jim broke away from his friends, saying "I have got to hit the books."He broke away from that lawless group years ago.
你不能戒除旧习惯吗?他与家庭断绝了关系。吉姆离开他的朋友时，说道：“我得回去做功课了。”他在几年前脱离了那个非法团体。

translation: 分解；发生故障；失败；毁掉；制服
examples: The machine must break down at this busy hour.He finally break down under the four-hour's strain.
正忙的时候，机器偏偏又坏了。在四小时的压力下他终于支持不了。

translation: 打断；闯入；训练；使逐渐习惯
examples: The nosy couple broke in on our conversation.Please don't break in on our conversation.
那对好管闲事的夫妇闯入我们的交谈。请不要打断我们的谈话。

translation: 折断；突然停止，暂停
examples: He broke off in the middle of a sentence.The door handle has broken off.She broke off a piece of chocolate and gave it to me.He broke off relations with his family.Let's break off work for a few minutes.Let's break off for half an hour and have some tea.
他一句话只说了一半就停住了。门的把手断了。她掰下一块巧克力给我。他与家庭断绝了一切联系。我们把工作暂停几分钟。让我们小憩半小时喝点茶。

translation: v. 爆发；突发
examples: A quarrel broke out between them.He predicted that war would break out in the next few years.
他们间爆发了一场争吵。他预言战争将在下几年中爆发。

translation: 打碎，破碎；结束；解散；衰落
examples: The stricken tanker began to break up on the rocks.They decided to break up the partnership.
油轮被击中后撞上礁石,毁了。他们决定终止合作关系。

translation: 引进；生产；增加
examples: He intends to bring in some reforms.Local residents were angry at not being brought in on (ie not being consulted about) the new housing scheme.Two suspicious characters were brought in.He does odd jobs that bring him in about 30 a week.His freelance work brings (him) in 5000 a year.Experts were brought in to advise the Government.The jury brought in a verdict of guilty.
他打算提出些改革措施。新的房屋计划未徵询当地居民的意见，他们感到非常气愤。逮捕了两名嫌疑犯。他做零工每周可赚约30英镑。他从事自由职业每年可获5000英镑。请来了专家担当政府顾问。陪审团作出有罪的裁决。

translation: 导致；引起；使…发展
examples: His illness followed on the death of his wife.Reading in a poor light may bring on a headache.He will bring a suit against his boss.He challenged my view on that matter.
他的病是因他妻子去世而引起的。在昏暗的灯光下看书会引起头疼。他要对老板提出控告。他就我对那件事的看法提出异议。

translation: 提出；教育；养育；呕出；（船等）停下
examples: These are matters that you can bring up in committee.The couple contrived to bring up their children on a small income.
这些问题你可在委员会中提出。这对夫妻设法以菲薄的收入把孩子扶养成人。

translation: 增进，加强
examples: You should build your arguments on facts.We are planning to set up a publishing house.He tried to build up his strength.The publicity was intended to stoke up interest in her music.We first have to build up our reserves of manpower.The pressure on the enemy is building up quickly.The company has built up a large fund for ages.She could feel the tension building up in his body.
你的论点应建立在事实的基础上。我们正打算建立一家出版社。他试图增进体质。宣传活动旨在增进人们对她的音乐的兴趣。我们首先得加强人力储备。对敌人的压力正在迅速加强。多年来这个公司已积累了大量资金。她能够感觉到在他身体中逐渐积累起来的张力。

translation: 偶然；意外地
examples: The traffic accident was born almost accidentally.I met him by chance at Canterbury Cathedral.
这个交通事故的发生几乎纯属偶然。我是在坎特伯雷大教堂偶然地碰到过他。

translation: 乘飞机；通过航空途径
examples: I shall travel to New York by air this weekend.The great virtue of air travel is speed.
这个周末我将要乘飞机去纽约旅行。乘飞机旅行的最大优点是速度快。

translation: 不久以后
examples: It's very likely to clear up by and by.We'll meet again by and by.By and by, the moon began to appear.By and by, however, he began to gain courage.At first he felt it awkward, but by and by he got used to it.
很可能不久要放晴了。我们不久又会再见。不久，月亮开始出现。不过，后来他逐渐胆大了。起先他感到棘手，后来就习惯了。

translation: 在白天；日间
examples: They lay by during the heat of the day.
他们在白天最热的时候停下来休息。

translation: 顺便说说，顺便问一下；在途中
examples: By the way, I love your hair that way.By the way,here is a little token of my affection.
顺便说一句，我喜欢你的发式。顺便说一下，这是我的一点儿小意思。
